1.content:
Sam barged through the door of his house. Exhausted from a long day’s workout, he threw his gym bag on the floor, and plopped himself down on the couch.

“Who’s home?!” he barreled.

Greg, one of Sam’s three roommates, was the first to answer. Running down the stairs, the 5’10” lacrosse player replied, “I’m here, bud! You back already? How was your workout?”

“Dude,” Sam replied, “I gotta stop going to that school gym of ours, and start working out at a real man’s gym! Can you believe I had to ask the gym managers again for more weights? That gym’s only built for weaklings! Don’t they know I’m too big for their puny weights!”

This was the third time this year their gym had to order new weights for Sam! Yet, Sam just kept on getting stronger and stronger and, Greg thought as he watched Sam bend his Herculean arm, bigger and bigger. Greg smiled at the thought of Sam growing even bigger.

“What’re you looking at, runt, with that goofy smile?” Sam said. “You see the gym bag there; my workout clothes need some cleaning!”

Greg picked up the bag, and said, “Yes, I’ll get right to these!”

“You fuckin’ better!”

As Greg ran off to the basement, Sam smiled to himself. He could only imagine what dirty thoughts Greg had been thinking behind that smile. Sam enjoyed being an object of desire; and he enjoyed the power he had over everyone he knew, especially his roommates. Seeing them lust and slave over him only increased his desire to be bigger and more powerful.

As Greg was down in the laundry room, another roommate, Brian, entered the room. Sam had known Brian for four years, ever since both men played on the college football team together. Sam was in his third year of college back then, and he took the young 6’ freshman under his wing. Sam was kicked off the team for poor grades soon thereafter, but the men remained friends. It was then Sam turned to bodybuilding, and soon Brian’s football career took off. A first-string quarterback, Brian led his team to a division championship title his junior year, and looked to be having similar success this year.

“I thought I heard your voice,” Brian said.

“Yeah, fucking took you long enough, runt, to get here. Where’s my food?!”

“Dude, you’re home an hour earlier than usual. I’ve only just started cooking.”

Sam grumbled to himself, then said, “Well, it better be ready soon!”

Brian nodded, knowing not to argue with his giant roommate. Instead he changed the subject, “Where’s Zeke?”

Zeke, the other roommate, was a junior, and was Sam’s lifting partner. Like Sam, Zeke was into bodybuilding, and he also sported a phenomenal physique. At just 5’1”, though, he looked more like Sam’s shadow then competition.

“He dropped me off first, and drove off to get our supplements.” Sam looked over at Brian, “Dude, I’m going to go nap for a bit, but you better wake me up when my dinner’s ready, okay?”

“Sure, boss,” Brian responded.

As Sam lumbered up the stairs, he thought how good his life was. Three of the hottest men in school waited on him hand and foot, and that was just at home. At the gym, on campus, in town … there was no shortage of guys intimidated and/or attracted to him that he easily controlled. Life indeed was good.

But as he lay in bed, drifting into his nap, he had no idea all that was about to change; his days as Biggest Man on Campus were about to come to an end.

Sam’s little nap turned into a much deeper sleep than he had planned. When he awoke, he found Zeke at the end of his bed, nudging him.

“Dude, you’re finally awake!” Zeke said, seeing Sam’s eyes slowly open.

“Leave me alone,” Sam muttered, half awake.

“Bud, but what about your dinner?”

Sam lay a little confused, but remembered he hadn’t yet eaten dinner that night. “What time is it?” he asked.

Zeke responded, “It’s past 8. We’ve been trying to wake you up for over an hour!”

Sam sat up, real groggy. “Dammit! It’s fucking past 8!”

“Dude, you really napped,” Zeke said. “But we’ve kept your dinner warm. I’ll go down and tell Bri that you’ll be down in a few minutes.”

After Zeke left the room, Sam struggled to stand up. Man, was he exhausted! He looked around the room. He felt odd. Not just tired, something else was wrong, but he couldn’t put his finger on it. Somehow the room looked different.

Sam grabbed the tanktop he had been wearing when he arrived home. That’s odd, he thought after putting it on, This shirt had fit me real tight just a couple hours ago. Now it’s rather loose.

He went to his drawers and pulled out another shirt, only he noticed the same thing, as another once-tight shirt was loose on him.

“Sam,” Brian called up from the bottom of the stairs. “I’ve reheated your dinner! It’s all ready for you now!”

Sam shook his head after trying yet a third shirt on with similar results. What was going on? He left his room, and headed downstairs.

“WHERE’S GREG?” he yelled out, as he entered the dining room.

Greg ran into the room, after hearing his name called out. “What is it, Sam?”

“Dude, what the fuck have you been doing to my laundry?”

Greg stammered, clearly seeing Sam was mighty upset, “I… I… I… Nothing. I mean, I just did laundry like I always have.”

“Asshole, you’ve totally stretched out my shirts. Look at this!” he said, pinching the shirt he had on him showing the extra room. “I wore this shirt yesterday and it was skin tight!”

“I’m sorry, Sam,” Greg tried to apologize. “I didn’t mean to do so.”

“Dude, you even stretched the shirt I was wearing just before going to bed!”

“Sam, I haven’t even touched that shirt. I only washed your dirty gym clothes today, and that stuff’s still in the dryer!”

Sam shook his head, and grumbled to himself. However, deep down, he realized Greg was speaking the truth. If he did stretch out his shirts, it probably wasn’t on purpose. He also knew what a kick Greg got out of seeing Sam in tight shirts. But even if Greg had accidentally stretched out his clothes, what happened to the shirt he had had on earlier that day.

Something seemed wrong, something was definitely off, and not just his shirts. He didn’t like it, and he felt unsettled. So much unsettled, he didn’t even finish his dinner.

“Sam, you ok?” Brian asked, seeing his plate with food still on it.

“Yeah, yeah. I guess I’m just not particularly hungry tonight.”

He left the dining room, and…

1113.content:
After dinner, Sam headed out to the living room, where Greg and Zeke were watching television.

“What are you guys watching?” Sam asked.

“Just a soccer game,” replied Zeke.

“Well, could you guys keep the volume down? I was thinking of turning in early and going to bed. I feel like shit.”

“Yeah, you don’t look so well,” Greg said. “Let me see if you have a fever.”

Greg stood up and walked over to Sam. That’s odd, Sam thought as his housemate approached him, Greg looks taller than usual. Like by a couple inches, at least.

“Dude, did you get taller recently?” Sam asked.

“No, why?”

“No, dude, you were totally not this tall just last week!”

Greg shook his head, confused. Man, Sam must really be ill. What’s with all this jibberish? “Let me feel your forehead,” Greg asked. He raised his arm up, and put the back of his hand against Sam’s head. But Sam couldn’t seem to be still; Greg's hand kept sliding up as Sam’s forehead kept dropping.

“Sam, can you stop bending your knees while I’m trying to feel your forehead?”

“What the hell are you talking about? I’m not bending my knees!”

Greg looked down and saw that Sam’s legs were completely straight. But how is that possible?, he wondered. He looked up, and continued to see the top of Sam’s head getting lower and lower.

Sam looked at the stunned expression of Greg's face. “What? What?” he cried out, noticing at the same time that Greg seemed to be getting taller in front of his eyes.

“I can’t believe this, Sam,” Greg said, shaking his head in disbelief. “But somehow, for some reason, you’re shrinking!”

Sam felt dizzy, and the room seemed to spin a bit. When he came to, he was standing next to Greg, whose hand was resting on his forehead.

“Dude, what the fuck are you doing?” Sam asked, slapping the hand away.

Greg didn’t respond. He stood quiet, in shock having just seen his roommate shrink in front of his own eyes. But Zeke couldn’t keep his mouth shut.

“Shit Sam, you just shrank!”

“What’d you say, you little punk?” Sam screamed, running over to Zeke, and lifting him by armpits. “What’d did you say, twerp?”

“I… I… said you shrank, bud! I’m sorry, it’s true.”

Sam looked around him, dropping Zeke onto the floor. The room looked different. The couch, the TV stand, the coffee table, even Zeke… all seemed to be a little higher than usual.

He saw Greg walking toward him, carrying what looked to be the shorts Sam had been wearing that night.

“These… um… fell off,” Greg mumbled.

Sam tore the shorts from Greg’s hand, staring at his roommate. Shit, Sam thought, How’d Greg get so tall? He’s only an inch or two shorter than me now.

“What’d you guys do to me? What kinda prank is this? Shrinking! Whatever. I’m onto you,” he screamed.

“Dude, this is no prank,” Zeke muttered.

“Shut up, dickhead!” Sam said shoving him aside, causing him to fall over the coffee table. “Joke’s over, boys! Now, if you’ll excuse me…”

111311.content:
“Now, if you’ll excuse,” Sam bellowed, “I’m going to bed! You fuckheads better be on your best behavior when I wake up tomorrow!”

With that, Sam stormed up the stairs. “Shrinking, my ass I’m shrinking!” Sam muttered to himself, as he slammed his bedroom door behind him. “I’m sure that’s just what those fuckers would love. To bring their god down a peg or two! Ha!”

Still, he thought to himself, it was an effective trick they had pulled. Hadn’t the loose shirt he was wearing fit tighter on him during dinner? They must’ve have done some kind of hypnosis trick on me downstairs and swapped shirts, he thought, remembering how dizzy he had felt.

But what about his perception of everything looking higher around him? He even felt that way in his bedroom. Damn, those fuckers are good pranksters!

But had he really shrunk? He looked over on his desk and saw a tape measure. He was just about to go over and measure himself when he stopped himself. Dude, I must really be tripping if I’m beginning to believe this nonsense!

He turned back to his bed, and jumped in. Tomorrow morning, after he cooled off, he’d have his revenge.

* * *

Meanwhile, downstairs Greg was assisting Zeke back to his feet. “You okay?”

“Yeah, I forgot never to question Sam when he’s angry.”

“But dude, you saw it all too, right?”

“Saw what all?” Brian said, as he entered the room from the kitchen. “What the hell was going on out here? What was all that noise I heard?”

Greg sat Brian down and told him what he had seen, as Zeke grabbed an ice pack from the kitchen.

Brian laughed after hearing Greg’s story. “Dude, you don’t honestly believe that? Your eyes must’ve been playing tricks on you.”

“No, I swear, I know what I saw. Right, Zeke?” Greg asked as Zeke re-entered.

“I dunno, Greg. Maybe our eyes were playing tricks on us. People don’t just shrink, do they?”

Greg just shook his head, as the three guys began cleaning up the room. While upstairs, Sam had fallen asleep.

1113111.content:
After they cleaned for awhile, Greg suddenly stopped.

"You know, let the big guy sleep," he said. "We don't have to be at his beck and call 24 hours a day. Let's all go out and have some beers or something."

Brian looked eager, but Zeke hesitated. After all, he had taken the brunt of one of Sam's outbursts earlier. "I don't know..."

"Oh, he can sleep off whatever's going on with him," Greg said. "You with me, Brian?"

"Yeah, I think this is what we need," Brian agreed. "An evening away from the overbearing lord and master."

"All right," Zeke agreed reluctantly. "I guess going out for a few hours wouldn't be the end of the world."

"Yeah, man," Greg said, as he and Brian gave each other high-fives.

Zeke frowned. "Maybe I ought to check in on Sam, you know, just to see if he needs anything before we go?"

"No," Greg said. "If you tell him, he may insist we stay here. Just to ruin our fun."

"Greg's right," Brian added. "Let's go while the going is good."

They headed for the door, but still Zeke hesitated. Then, although he glanced to the top of the stairs, he experienced a rare burst of defiant spirit.

"Yeah, you're both right," he declared. "Sam will just have to get along with us for awhile."

-----

Upstairs, the sound of the front door slamming brought Sam out of another sound sleep. He muttered and turned over, burying his face in the pillow. "Stupid fuckoffs," he mumbled. "Remind me to pound..." he yawned... "asses."

He started snoring again, never noticing how his body continued to telescope ever smaller. He had already lost a few inches, but not he had gone from a tall 6'6" man to one of only common stature.

Sam continued to toss and turn, thrashing beneath the sheets. When he awoke again, his throat felt parched.

"Brian!" Sam shouted.

No reply came. The house sounded almost eerie in its silence.

Sam staggered from the bed, still bleary-eyed from sleep. "Brian!" Sam shouted again. "Greg! Zeke!"

Still, none of his servants and housemates came running to his assistance.

He stumbled into the bathroom and poured himself a glass of water. As he drank, he also looked into the mirror. His reflection stared back at him from a lower point in the glass than usual.

"What the hell?" Sam cried.

He remembered the tape measure, but he still didn't have the nerve to use it to verify the suspicions that were rapidly becoming difficult to deny.

"Dammit, where the fuck is everybody?"

He tore out of his room and descended the stairs. "Where in the hell did they go?" Sam wondered.

11131111.content:
Arriving downstairs, Sam received another unsettling surprise. The furniture looked larger. Cushions on the sofa and chairs had plumped to larger sizes. The cabinet of the entertainment center loomed larger than usual in the room. One positive aspect of the changed perspective was the wide-screen television, which now looked even bigger.

"It could be cool to watch games on a screen that size," Sam muttered.

He wandered into the kitchen, with still no sign of the guys.

"Where the hell are they?" Sam growled irritably as he tugged on the waistband of his boxers. The underwear, like all his other clothing, was far too roomy on his downsized frame.

He still felt thirsty, so he decided to grab a bottle of water from the fridge. He opened the door and noticed the shelves looked higher. Fetching one of the bottles, he noted that the plastic container felt odd in his hand.

He was unscrewing the lid on the water bottle when he heard a loud ringing.

Sam turned and walked across the room to the wall-mounted telephone. The house still had one land-line, although he and all the guys had their own cell phones.

He answered the phone. "Yeah? Hello?"

Sam was hopeful that one of his erstwhile roommates might be checking in with him and he could order them to get their ass back to the house.

Instead, he heard a strange voice, which was obviously modulated by some artificial means. The voice sounded like one of those strange computer voices.

"SAM?"

"Yeah, who the hell is this?"

"DID YOU GET YOUR SURPRISE?"

"Surprise? What are you talking about?"

A peal of artificial laughter sent chills down Sam's spine.

"DON'T PLAY DUMB, BIG GUY."

Sam felt a surge of anger. "Who is this? Are you the one who did, uh, who caused me to..."

Oddly, Sam refused to state in words what he knew was happening. Fortunately, the mysterious caller didn't hesitate at all. "DID I CAUSE YOU TO SHRINK?" The voice asked.

"Yes, damn you! How did you do it? If you think you are going to get away with this..."

"ARE YOU ALONE?"

Sam cut off his tirade. "Are you spying on me, too?"

"I'LL COME FOR YOU SOON ENOUGH." The person on the other end of the line ended the call with a sharp click.

Sam screamed curses at the phone. Once he spent his anger, he felt the unfamiliar sensation of fear settle into his belly.

At that very moment, as he still held the phone receiver in his hand, his shorts slid over his hips and fell to the floor. Sam cursed again, and slammed the phone back into its cradle on the wall before bending to retrieve his shorts.

To his dismay, he was still shrinking... not by much, but the process was mercilessly persistent.

He almost screamed when he heard someone coming in the front door.

111311111.content:
There was an awkward moment when Sam encountered his roommates, who were returning from some time away from Sam and his constant demands.

The three housemates, Greg, Brian and Zeke, stopped laughing and joking with each other when they laid eyes on the once proud and mighty Sam, who had managed to pull his too-big boxers back onto his frame when he heard them entering.

The most unsettling aspect of the change in Sam's height was the new necessity of having to physically look up to his mates.

Looking down at him, Brian, the tallest of the roomies, made a whistle of astonishment. "Would you look at Sam!"

"What happened?" Zeke asked.

"Oh, dude," Greg entered the conversation. "You are downright puny."

Sam bristled. "It's not that bad," he said. "You guys are just wanting to yank my chain."

Greg shook his head. "Man, it is sort of bad," he insisted. "You're short."

"Even shorter than me now," Zeke said.

"No!" Sam protested. If he was shorter than 5'1" Zeke, that meant he must be...

"Yeah, I'd say you are not even five feet tall!" Greg exclaimed.

Sam got nervous. He had already lost almost two feet of height. He still had his muscular build, but he had the body of a freakin' munchkin.

"How is this happening?" Greg asked. Of the four guys, he was always the problem-solver. "Have you done anything out of the ordinary?"

"Maybe someone is playing a prank," Brian suggested.

"Or you might have pissed off the wrong person," Zeke suggested.

"What do you mean?" Sam snapped. "What could I have done to make someone make me shrink?"

Zeke rolled his eyes. "Are you serious?"

Brian laughed. "You can come across as..."

"What?" Sam protested angrily.

"Well, you are demanding, dude," Brian dared to tell Sam. "And you are a little arrogant."

Sam wanted to put Brian in his place, but the six-foot Brian had now grown out of Sam's reach.

The guys seemed curious and interested in this bizarre change, but they didn't seem upset in the least. Sam began to wonder if one of his own roommates might be the cause of his shrinking. Could one of them have disguised his voice and made that mysterious phone call from earlier?

Greg took charge. "We need to stay calm and consider every possibility," he said.

"It's easy for you to stay calm!" Sam shouted. "You aren't the one who's a midget!"

Greg looked down patiently and waited for Sam to cease his tirade. "First, we should look for a pattern. The shrinking seems to be progressive."

"Yeah," Brian agreed. "I wonder how small he could get?"

Sam tried to hide his shivering. He hadn't really contemplated that the shrinking might do more than make him a very short guy. What if he kept dwindling down to the size of a doll? Or to the size of a bug?

"Someone must be responsible for this," Greg said. "Maybe we ought to make a list of suspects."

"Yeah," Brian said. He looked down at Sam, who was struggling to keep his boxers around him. "Got any idea who would be out to get you?"

"There's no one with the balls to do this to me!" Sam declared hotly.

In the back of his mind, however, he kept hearing the voice of that strange caller, the person who had promised to come for him soon.

But Sam decided he didn't want to let the guys know how the caller had him frightened. His pride wouldn't let him admit that the strange call had gotten to him.

Zeke yawned. "It's really late," he said. "Let's sleep on this and tackle it fresh in the morning."

"Good idea," Sam said. He led the way toward the stairs, but as he stepped on the first of the series of steps, his boxers dropped again.

He heard the guys laughing behind him. Reaching down and grabbing them again, pulling them back to his waist, he shouted a curse over his shoulder and stomped toward his room.

1113111112.content:
Back in his own room with the door shut and locked, Sam let the boxers drop to the floor once again. As much as he tried to put on that macho show for the rest of the guys, he was really starting to panic at this point.

"What am I gonna do? What am I gonna do?" he quietly asked himself over and over again. Even his voice was starting to sound different, a little less bold, not purely masculine sounding as it had been. It was as if it was a pitch or two higher than before. But Sam didn't have the time to settle very far into that thought.

Greg's idea of figuring out how this happened only seemed to elevate Sam's paranoia. Greg could have easily been the one who did this to him, Sam knew full well how much the guy obsessed about him. Zeke too, that little bastard had always been jealous of how big Sam was. Even Brian, though the least likely of the trio, could have been holding some deep seeded grudge over all the things Sam had that he himself did not.

Sam sighed as the wheels turned in his head. Pacing nervously around the bedroom in the nude didn't seem to calm him down. The guys seemed to think that the whole world would have loved to see himself get taken down in one way or another. Could he really have that many enemies? The whole world seemed to worship the ground he walked on, well most of the world. His mother hadn't approved of his lifestyle, having cut him off financially about a year ago. There would be no way in the world she'd do THIS to him though. Coach Franklin didn't seem to appreciate when Sam had to quit the football team, but the team seemed to be doing just fine without him. Besides, the guy was way too busy and probably not apt to come up with this sort of a thing for revenge. Shrinking Sam wouldn't get him back on the team by any means.

Sam's thoughts were interrupted by a growing hum of voices out in the hallway, maybe one of the other rooms. Sam imagined the guys discussing a conspiratory plot against him. He wasn't ready to storm out there in his usual fashion, but he was still annoyed enough to do something about it.

"KEEP IT THE FUCK DOWN YOU SHIT-BATS!!!" he yelled, attempting to artificially deepen his voice by the third word. There was no response to his demand. Instead, the voices increased in volume and were punctuated by giggles and chortles. "COME ON ASSHOLES, I'M TRYING TO SLEEP HERE!!!" It didn't do any good, the chatter failed to cease.

Sam was beyond frustrated. He couldn't even figure out how to manage the way he was feeling. He felt small, insignificant, ignorable. But that was impossible, at least in his previous experience. He tiptoed to the door in an attempt to listen closer to what the guys were talking about. When he got to the door though, he stopped suddenly, catching his reflection in the cheap tall and narrow mirror mounted onto the door. He had been so used to checking himself out in it on a daily basis, as if all the attention from others wasn't enough to feed his massive ego. It was hanging from the top of the door and at 4 feet in length stopped just short of mid thigh. Now, though, the top of his head came about halfway up the length of the mirror and the bottom of it chopped off his reflection around his pubes.

He seethed at the pathetic size of himself. He'd never even met an adult man who was under five feet in stature, and now for whatever reason he had become just that! With his mouth agape, Sam's right hand went on autopilot, feeling up his cobbled abs, massive (well at least proportionately) pecs, impressive traps, and the his left bicep. It was almost as if he was looking for reassurance that although in a smaller size he was still all there. The fleeting moment of examination turned bitter and Sam's face tightened into an angry visage.

"Shrinking...." Sam began slowly, "I'm fucking SHRINKING!!!" Quick as lightning, he punched the mirror with an animalistic force, causing it to crack and shatter. Had he been at his full size, his fist may have well gone straight through the door. It relieved a little tension, as if the mirror had anything to do with the cause of his predicament. Dimming the lights and stomping toward his bed, he had at least for a while shut out the persistent voices in the hallway. Sam didn't yell back at them again, what was the use of it? Instead, he rolled over to access his nightstand, turning his alarm clock radio on and cranking the knob to full volume. Loud rock music filled the room, drowning out any outside noise. Sam began to relax a little after a few songs, but he was nowhere near tired enough to sleep. His mind was way too occupied with everything going on. Grunting, he decided to resort to a sure fire way of wearing himself out enough to sleep.

Sam fumbled with his smaller hand, pulling open the drawer of his nightstand and fishing around for his lube. Finally managing a grip on it, he knew instantly that the familiar bottle felt much bigger than it should have been. Trying to ignore it and force himself into the mood, he squirted out a generous amount into his palm and slid his hand over his still limp dick. Sam wasn’t asleep for too long until he woke up with the urge to piss. He groggily turned over in bed and after 3 tries managed to slap down the off button on his alarm clock radio. Clearing his throat, he looked at the led display that read 2:01 with a small “am” off in the bottom corner.

“Shit,” he grumbled as he stretched out on the bed, it seemed a little bigger than it had just a few hours before, but not by that much luckily. Making his way off the bed and cursing a little bit more, he stopped at the door to listen for anyone awake at this hour. It didn’t seem so. Gingerly, he opened the door to the hallway and padded in the nude over to the hall bathroom.

The toilet was big, the sink was big and Sam was once again feeling just as midget sized as he had become. As he pissed, his balls hung just an inch above the rim of the toilet, and when he washed his hands he felt as if he were some small child who could have used a booster step to get up there.

Safe again and back in his room he wasn’t tired anymore. In fact, he felt as if he had just shot-gunned a series of energy drinks. His suspicions of his housemates were growing exponentially at this point. He imagined all sorts of nefarious plans they may have in store for him. But with them asleep, now was his chance to get out of the house and try to figure out a way back to his tall hunky normal self. He would need to get some clothes on first. He walked right past the discarded boxers, figuring he’d need something tighter fitting that would stay on his smaller body. He dug through his underwear drawer, making a mess of the neatly folded pairs, finally producing a pair of tight bikini briefs. Well, at least they had been tight. Putting them on now, the waistband sagged and felt a little loose, and the fabric draped a bit and showed ample space inside instead of constricting on his package and showing off the detailed outline of it.

Looking down with disapproval, Sam next laid his eyes on the row of size 16 shoes Zeke had neatly arranged alongside the wall of his room. “None of these are going to even come close to fitting me now!” he thought, and it would be true for his pants and shirts. Maybe he could manage to rig something together though. As Sam opened his closet, he was stopped short by the sound of laughter out of the cracked open window. His interest was piqued and for the first time in his life, he automatically assumed that the laughter was directed at him. The shade was open and the lights were on so anyone could have been looking in there at him.

Laying low and sadly not having to try very hard to do so, he crept up to the window, peering out onto the main road the fraternity was on he saw a small masses of people moving about without having too much of a sense of direction. The bars were closing and drunken students were heading back to their respective dwellings. Sam stayed at the window, observing them for a while and wishing he was having as blissful of a time as they all were. It’s kind of hard to let go and have fun when you are shrinking though. His eyes followed groups of women and men stumbling and laughing and talking too loudly. He heard clear recollections of all the rabble rousing that went on at the bars.

He scanned the street from left to right, and when his line of sight came to the streetlight not far from the front doors of the frat house, he spied something out of the ordinary. There was a figure standing underneath the artificial light and not moving a bit. It was wearing a wide brimmed hat that shadowed away its face. Sam couldn’t tell right away, but the figure looked like it was facing him, watching him. And then it waved at him.

Sam’s first reaction was to duck out of sight. But as he crouched, he realized this was his chance. This had to be the fucker who was shrinking him. Sam may have been a lot smaller, but he was still a strong guy. And with the way things were going, if he got much smaller he would be no match for anyone. He had to confront this asshole now! It was now or never.

Sam sprung up, pushing the window open in a fluid motion and climbing up onto the sill. He paused to see that the figure had remained in place before stepping out onto the narrow roof over the porch.

“You fucker!!!” Sam yelled with a fury in his voice, “I’m gonna fucking kill you!!!” But as he yelled, he lost his balance and fell forward, and just as suddenly was lurched back by his bikini briefs getting caught on the window frame. His body see-sawed back and forth a few times until the underwear gave way, tearing apart and sending Sam plummeting over the roof and into the hedge of shrubs below.
1113111112.title: Sam wakes early and decides to get out of the h...

choices: “You look really cute when you’re smaller,” Greg says.
“Man, the guys have to see this!” Greg then says.
1113112.content:
Sam looked around him. He was in an odd room. It was dark, though a few columns of light streamed in through some holes in the ceiling a couple feet above him. He then noticed the room he was in had no doors. There was no furniture either. Just him.

He walked around the room. The floor felt odd yet familiar. It was of no recognizable material he could think of. He pushed his hands against the walls; the walls seemed to be the same material as the floor.

He began to worry. Where was he? How would he get out? He pounded against the walls, surprised that they seemed to shake a bit as he did so. The walls seemed flimsy, yet he couldn’t break them. “Help!” he screamed. “I’m trapped in here!”

He then heard some pounding, and the floor began to shake. Suddenly, the roof seemed to rise up and disappear, and bright sunlight burst in, blinding him.

“You little fucker complaining in there?” a familiar voice called from the heavens above.

Sam looked up, his eyes adjusting to the light, when he saw the gigantic face of his roommate Greg. Shit, Greg was a giant; his face above seemed to fill the sky!

“Told you you were shrinking, dumbass!” Greg bellowed. Sam cowered as Greg lowered his Mack truck-sized hand into the room, which Sam suddenly began to realize was just a shoebox. Backed into a corner, Sam had nowhere to go, as Greg’s index finger rubbed against his chest.

“Now toy, let’s you and I have some fun!” Greg said, laughing, as he began to wrap his hand around Sam’s chest.

* * *

“Let me go, let me go!” Sam yelled.

“Dude, you okay?” Greg asked.

Sam opened his eyes and looked around. He was in his bedroom, lying in his bed. He had just been dreaming. And there was Greg, standing at the side of his bed, staring down at him.

“What the fuck are you doing here?” Sam asked.

“Dude, I was just checking in on you. You were really upset last night, and I wanted to see if you had cooled down, and to see… to see…” Greg couldn’t continue. He hadn’t been able to get out of his mind the sight of Sam shrinking last night. He wanted to believe his housemates were right, that his eyes had been playing tricks on him. But then again, he also wanted to be right, as the thought of Sam shrinking had sparked an undeniable erotic charge in him.

“To see what, asswipe?”

“Well,” Greg gulped, hiding the tape measure he had grabbed from Sam’s desk. He had hoped to measure Sam as he was sleeping, and hadn’t been expecting him to wake so suddenly.

“What’s that behind your back?” Sam growled.

“Nothing.”

“Nothing my ass,” Sam barked, sitting up in bed. “Give it to me!”

Sam reached out to grab Greg, but Greg had stepped back just in time.

“Give it to me!” Sam cried, jumping out of bed, tripping on his sheets as he did so, landing on his knees.

“Was that my tape measure?” he said, clambering up on his feet. “That fucking bet… ter… not…” But Sam went silent, as he rose to his feet, and found himself staring right at Greg’s chin.

“Ha!” Greg, noticeably taller was ecstatic. “You really are shrinking!”

Terror clutched at Sam’s heart as he began stepping backward into the corner of his bedroom. “This can’t be happening!” he muttered to himself. “This must be some trick.” He looked over and up at Greg, and saw his roommate had a rather mischievous look on his face.
1113112.title: Greg the Giant

choices: The boys set up some new rules for their shorter roommate.
Sam shrinks some more.
11131122.content:
“Man, the guys have to see this!” Greg said.

“No!” Sam yelled. “I don’t know what’s going on, but don’t say anything to …”

“Hey, Brian! Zeke! You guys have to check this out!”

“Dude, shut up!” cried Sam.

“What’s going on in here?” Brian asked, stepping into Sam’s bedroom. “Holy shit! Sam, what happened to you? You’re short!”

Sam looked up at Brian, who was nearly a head taller than him now. But before he could say anything, Greg called out, “Bri, you didn’t believe me last night. But look, Sammy really is shrinking!”

“I am not shrinking!” Sam yelled. “This is all some bad dream!”

“I wish this was a dream,” Zeke said stumbling into the bedroom bleary-eyed. “What’s with all the shouting? You woke me up.”

“Check out the Big Man on Campus!” Greg taunted. “Not so big anymore.”

Zeke looked over at Sam. Sam was still taller than his workout partner, but not by much.

“Whoa, dude!” Zeke said, “Look at you! You shrunk! How tall are you?”

“Good question,” Greg said, pulling out the tape measure. “Let’s just see.”

Seeing the tape measure, and not wanting to know the answer to Zeke’s question, Sam attempted to run, but Brian and Zeke blocked his exit. Despite his shorter height, he was still a powerhouse of muscle. He could easily take either man down on their own. But together, he was no match for the combined strength of both men. Still, it was quite a struggle for Greg to measure Sam, as arms and legs thrashed against. But in the end, Greg got his answer.

“Five-foot, five inches!”

Fuck, that’s over a foot shorter than my normal height! Sam thought.
11131122.title: “Man, the guys have to see this!”

choices: Sam's now five feet tall (one inch shorter than Zeke)
Sam's now 4'11" (two inches shorter than Zeke)
111311222.content:
Fuck, I'm a whole foot shorter than my normal height! Sam thought.

The formerly 6'6" BMOC was feeling far from his normally arrogant, confident self. He was trying to figure out how such a thing was possible when....

"Wow!" Zeke said. "He's almost as short as me!"

Brian and Greg, who both now loomed over their two shorter roommates, agreed. In fact, Brian went a step beyond. "Yeah, a few more inches, Mr. Samson Jones is going to be the shortest man in the house," he said with enthusiasm that caused Sam to stare up and snarl a curse at him.

"Oh, take it easy," said Greg, getting into the act. "We shouldn't belittle poor Sam."

"Yeah, let's not put him down," Zeke said with a laugh.

"You guys better cut it out, and quick!" Sam growled loudly. "When I grow back I am going to..."

His voice trailed off as he noticed all three roommates looking down at him. Then, his mind focused.

All three of the guys looked bigger, even Zeke.

"Oh Fuck!" Sam exclaimed.

The guys smiled down indulgently and gleefully, especially Zeke.

"Look!" Zeke ordered in a tone close to triumphant. "He's still shrinking!"

"Guys," Greg said. "Time to take new measurements."

Sam tried to take a step back as they advanced on him again, the tape measure in Greg's hands. At the same time, he struggled to hold up his pants and shorts, now far too roomy.
111311222.title: Still Shrinking

choices: Make them breakfast.
Do their laundry.
1113112222.content:
Sam backed away as his three housemates again began to crowd around him. He looked over at Greg's hand, still holding the tape measure.

Sam felt powerless. Just minutes ago, he had lost the battle against Brian and Zeke. And now that both of them were taller than him, he knew there was no way he'd be able to hold them off.

Reluctantly and with little fight, he let them pin him to the wall. And there he stood stone still, while Greg extended the tape measure…

"Guys, you won't believe this!" Greg laughed. "Mr. Sam Almighty is no bigger than 5 feet tall! In fact, he's just 4'11"!"

Hearing this, Sam felt a sting of pain course through his body. He looked over at Zeke, standing now two inches taller than he. That shrimpboat … now superior in height to him! Painfully, it dawned on him that his rule of the roost was over.

"Guys, guys, please…" he uttered weakly.

"What?" Zeke said, feeling surprisingly cocky, now that he was no longer the little guy of the house. "Feeling a little inferior, are you?"

"Dude, do you know how much shit you've put us through the past couple years?!" Greg chimed in. "My God, we were practically your slaves."

"You know…" Brian cut in. "Maybe it's time 'Big' Sam slaved over us!"

Greg smiled, "Yeah, yeah! Dude, that'd be awesome! It's time he started to do some chores for us for a change!"

What chore do the guys make Sam do first?
1113112222.title: The tables have turned ...

choices: Sam makes a shambles of breakfast
Sam: better-fitting clothes or cook in the nude
11131122221.content:
"I think he could start by making breakfast this morning," Greg announced, letting go of the end of the tape measure. The reel of tape snapped back into the holder, clicking violently. The sound caused a startled Sam to visibly jump.

The guys laughed at his expense. "What's the matter?" Zeke asked.

"You watch your mouth!" Sam threatened. "A couple of inches won't stop me from kicking your..."

In unison, Greg and Brian stepped forward, forming a solid wall between Zeke and the now smallest member of the household.

"Maybe we would have something to say about that," Brian said, starting down at Sam and letting a big grin tug at the corner of his mouth.

"That's right," Greg concurred. "Things around here are going to change."

Sam swallowed hard, knowing he could do nothing physically against his former dutiful servants. He was also puzzled, but tight-lipped, about the strange sensation he felt having to crane his head back to look up at the taller of his housemates.

"I guess I could scramble some eggs," Sam said with hardly subtle reluctance.

"Oh, no," Brian said. "That won't do at all, will it guys?"

Zeke and Greg shook their heads.

"I want toast, and cut off the crusts," Brian said. "And bacon, pancakes..."

"What about waffles instead?" Greg asked.

"How about both waffles and pancakes?" Zeke, emboldened, interjected.

Sam balled his hands into fists to control his rising temper.

"Sounds good to me," Brian said.

Sam decided to try one last gambit. "Guys, I will be glad to cook for you, but maybe we should do something about my shrinking. Things could get out of hand."

Brian, who seemed to be taking up the leadership role, yawned. "What do you think we should do about it?"

Sam sputtered. "I...I don't know...but we can't just ignore it! Maybe, uh, should I see a doctor?"

"I can't think on an empty stomach," Brian decided. "You make breakfast, and after we have eaten, we will discuss what to do about you."

Sam didn't like the tone in Brian's voice, but he tugged on his shorts to keep them from slipping off. "OK! I will cook breakfast, but..."

"Fantastic!" Brian said. "Call us when it is done."

And, without waiting for any more of Sam's delay tactics, the trio marched off.

the 4'11" man trudged toward the kitchen. At the moment, he entertained scenarios of delightful revenge when he got his full size back.

Then, when he found himself facing the enormous refrigerator and the tall kitchen counters, thoughts of turning the tables evaporated as he faced what was rapidly becoming a difficult task, that is, the cooking of a breakfast fit for the lordly whims of three big jocks, all now fully superior to their former overlord.
11131122221.title: Breakfast for the new kings

choices: It's Greg
Who the hell are you?
111311222211.content:
“Oh shit…” Sam grumbled as he had to stand on the tips of his bare toes to reach the milk on the top shelf in the door of the refrigerator. This breakfast was going to be a monumental task for three reasons. First of all, Sam had never cooked a thing in his life, unless making a peanut butter sandwich counted. Even his idea of scrambling eggs was a stretch, but he had seen people performing the task enough that he thought he could handle it. Secondly, his new smaller size was really going to put a wrench in the whole process. Lastly, and definitely the most nerve wracking piece of the equation, was the fact that he had been put on the level of servicing the desires of his roommates. Sam wasn’t used to even doing favors for others, let alone being forced to do work as if he were an indentured servant. The other two parts seemed manageable as Sam was used to physical and skill challenges, but the way his roommates were making him do this was crushing. He would definitely have to plan his revenge. After he grew back…..if that was even going to happen….Sam didn’t bother completing the thought as he fumbled with the milk. He misjudged how heavy it was going to be, had gotten a little preoccupied with his thoughts and had gotten a bit off balance with the reaching. He lost his grip and the full gallon of milk came plummeting to the ground –plunk-. Most of what was in the container was splattered across the cheap linoleum floor.

There’s a chorus of laughs that follow from the other room and Sam hears Greg warn that he better not be making a mess. Zeke muses about the hard time Sam must be having. Brian says something Sam doesn’t catch, but they all seem to belly laugh in response. Sam moans and grumbles a few choice words as he picks up the jug, just a bit of milk still left in it, tossing it onto the counter and not bothering to clean up the milk splayed all over the floor.

As he removed more groceries from the refrigerator and the cabinets things didn’t go any better. A few broken eggs ended up on the floor. A fountain of flour puffed out of the bag when Sam squeezed too hard on it, leaving a coating of white powder all over him and a good portion of the kitchen.

He needed a cookbook. The eggs and toast seemed intuitive enough, but pancakes and waffles? That was another story entirely. Only the cookbooks some of the guys had gotten from their families were all on top of the fridge. Sam slid a chair over to the fridge and climbed on top of it, watching his footing and being as careful as he could be.

Back in the other room, Brian lays back in the recliner, putting his hands behind his head and stretching his legs out. With a yawn and a sigh, he mused, “Ahhh, this is great, isn’t it guys? I mean now that Sam has been cut down to size, this house has been turned upside down in the best possible way.” Greg flipped on the tv and propped his feet on the cocktail table. “Yeah man, as long as he’s gonna prove himself to be useful. I mean, I’ve never seen Sam do much of anything but work out, eat, sleep and make everyone else do the rest. If he can’t contribute, we can always kick his ass out of the house. It isn’t as if he pays rent or is technically on the lease or anything, you know?”

Brian laughed in response and then seemed lost in thought, probably imagining that scenario out. Zeke took a break from tapping at his smart phone, “You can’t be serious Greg. I know Sam can be an ass, but underneath all that crap he’s a good guy. We can’t just kick him out! Where would he go? And besides, who knows if he is still shrinking or if and when it’s going to stop? He could end up doll sized, or microscopic or something. I really think after he finishes breakfast we should try to help him find out what’s going on.” Zeke glanced back down at his phone, “I’ve been googling people shrinking and I can’t find anyth…”

Greg cut Zeke off abruptly, “Zeke, give it a rest man! There’s no way I’m lifting a finger to help Sam. If any of us had a problem like he’s having now, I guarantee he’d do nothing but spend all the time he could rubbing it in and making things worse. Just consider this some sort of karmic justice.”

Brian nodded and chimed in too, “I don’t know why you are so worried about Sam. What the hell has he ever done for you? He only gives you any attention when he wants something from you or maybe if he wants to make you feel like shit. It’s like you’re in love with him or something. Fuck Sam dude, move on with your life, I’m sure there’s some guy out there for you.” Brian sniffed the air a bit, “Hey, you guys smell something burning?” Just as Greg got up from the couch, all three of them heard another loud crash.

Back in the kitchen Sam was frustrated enough that he was ready to cry. Sitting in the middle of the floor, his shorts knotted and tangled around his ankles, he was mired in various food products that pooled out around him. A tipped over stool lay not far from him, an upside down frying pan smoldering the floor near some burnt pieces of bacon tossed outside of it. Sam’s face and chest were covered in pancake batter, the cracked dripping bowl of batter was rolling to a halt on the floor with him. Right behind him, Sam heard a heavy footfall. It was is someone had snuck up on him and then stamped a foot down as if to announce his presence. Sam turned and looked up at the figure just as the toaster popped out 4 pieces of blackened toast.
111311222211.title: Consider Breakfast Ruined

choices: The guys watch TV instead of discussing Sam
The phone rings and Sam answers
111311222212.content:
When Sam's boxers slid down to his ankles as he fetched items from the towering refrigerator, he cursed and deposited a carton of eggs and some other groceries on the counter.

He tried pulling them back up, but they were simply too large to stay on his much-reduced form, especially if he meant to move around the kitchen as he went about the preparation of breakfast.

"Screw it!" Sam left the boxers on the floor, which left the little muscle-bound jock bare to the world.

He didn't care, too much, as he was used to lounging around in various states of undress. He got a mild thrill out of tantalizing his roommates.

Now, it felt different, as if it made him more vulnerable.

Being almost two feet shorter than usual made for some awkwardness with even the mundane task of cracking open eggs. He stood at the kitchen sink, cracking the eggs into a glass bowl, but the sink was now almost level with his chest. He missed once, and the accident caused the egg yolk to disappear down the drain instead of into his bowl.

He heard laughter and turned to see Zeke had returned.

"Having difficulty?" Zeke asked.

"No," Sam lied, but he moved the bowl down to crotch level.

"Look, let me help you out," Zeke said. "I do owe you a lot for helping me in the gym and all."

"I can handle it."

"Sure you can," Zeke said, but he grabbed the bowl. As he moved across the kitchen, he glanced back at Sam's great ass.

"You are still gorgeous, just more compact."

"Don't joke about this! I look like a freak!"

"No, you don't."

"Yes, I do!"

"So, we're about the same height. Does that mean you have always thought I look like a freak?"

Sam's mouth opened, but then he closed it. He didn't know what to say. "It's not the same," he decided. "You are used to being short."

"Yeah, and now maybe you'll have to learn the same lessons." Having finished with the eggs, he handed the bowl back to Sam. "I think the deal was you would make breakfast for us, so I will not stand in your way."

Sam groaned. If he hadn't antagonized Zeke, this would have been a much simpler task. But old habits die hard.

Still, he figured that, based on Zeke's attitude, he could rule him out as a suspect. That left Greg or Brian, or both of them. Had they done this to him?

He kept pondering on his dilemma as he finished the meal.

He also learned one other important lesson. Frying bacon and working naked do not go well together. Several times he got splattered by hot sizzling grease splatters.

Appealing aromas announced when he was nearly finished, and the guys all gathered at the kitchen table.

"Looks good," Greg announced.

Brian, standing next to Sam, reached down and rubbed his little buddy's head. "You did good, runt."

Sam pushed away Brian's hand, but the bigger guy just laughed and had a seat at the table.

They demolished all the food in just minutes that had taken Sam nearly an hour to prepare.

"Now, can we do something about me?" Sam asked, trying to sound calm and reasonable.

The guys stood from the table.

"We'll discuss it in the living room," Brian said.

Sam started to follow, but Brian turned. "I said that we... the three of us... would discuss it."

"But..." Sam began.

"Your job is to clear the table and wash the dishes."

Sam swallowed hard, and declined to argue. At least they meant to discuss his situation....
111311222212.title: The naked chef

choices: Lie and tell Marc Zeke isn't home
Call Zeke to the phone
1113112222122.content:
Sam made several trips back and forth from table to sink, clearing away the breakfast dishes.

On his final trip, the phone rang. He hurried to get rid of the load of dirty plates and stretched to answer the phone hanging on the kitchen wall.

"Hello?"

"Hi. Is Zeke there?"

The voice sounded familiar. "Sure. Who's this?"

"Is this Sam?" The caller asked. "You don't sound like yourself."

Then, the voice dawned on him.

"Is this Marc?" Sam asked, thinking of the lean, tall trainer at the gym where he worked out with Zeke several times a week.

"Yes, it is," Marc said. He sounded as if he stifled a giggle. "So, how are you, big guy?"

"Look, what do you want with Zeke?" Sam started getting on edge.

"I need to talk to him," Marc said. "It's nothing big...just a little project we are undertaking."

Sam felt his heart beat faster. Was Marc dropping clues? Nothing big...little project... could they be in cahoots together to cut him down a peg or two? Sam knew he had never quite trusted Marc. There was just something about him...

"So, could you get Zeke for me?" Marc asked impatiently.
1113112222122.title: The phone rings and Sam answers

choices: It's Zeke!
It's Greg!
11131122222.content:
Greg continued to speak, "Y'know. I got a week's load of laundry I've been meaning to get to. I haven't had the time to clean my own clothes, as I was too busy cleaning Sam's."

"Yeah," Zeke chipped in, "My gym clothes could also use a good wash."

"How about it, Sammy? Think you can get all our wash done by lunchtime?" Brian asked.

"You guys gotta be fucking kidding me," Sam glared back. "I don't do laundry!"

"Oh really?" Greg said, stepping somewhat menacingly toward Sam until there was barely an inch between them. Greg peered down at his nearly foot shorter housemate. "I'm sure what you really meant to say was that you didn't use to do laundry. But today we're gonna change all that, hunh?"

Sam couldn't help but feel somewhat intimidated by the towering Greg. Even though, truth be told, Sam still had the strength to house Greg if need be, the strange feeling of having to turn his head so high up to look into Greg's eyes made him feel small, weak, vulnerable.

Sam gulped, "I … I … " Then, collecting himself, and in an effort to look a little tough, responded. "Yeah, sure! I got this laundry thing! Today! But just this once, guys! I'm sure soon I'll be back to my old height, and then…."

"Is that a threat, pipsqueak?" Greg quickly cut him off.

"Um … umm…"

"I didn't think so! Now, shut your trap, and get to work!"

Sam didn't need to be told twice. Still clasping his ridiculously oversized boxers, he hurried out his bedroom door, leaving the guys behind.



So freaked out was Sam that he didn't hear the conversation he left behind…

"Are we being too rough on him?" Zeke asked. He knew what it was like to be picked on for being short, and was beginning to feel some pangs of guilt.

"Nah!!" Greg responded, "Just think what a prick he's been to us! I don't how this shrinking thing has happened, but dude, I feel like it's Christmas morning!"

Brian had been quiet a bit, but then responded, "Jeez, just think … if he ever regains his size, he's gonna be an even bigger asshole to us, guys! Maybe, Zeke's right."

Once again, Greg was quick with the response, "Yeah, well, we'll just have to really teach him a lesson about how it feels to be picked on by others…. Freak him out real good, so he never treats us like shit again, no matter what size he is." He paused, and then smiled, "Besides, what if he doesn't grow back to his old size?"

"Or," Zeke added, asking the question that was on all their minds, "What if he gets even smaller?"



Meanwhile, Sam was down in the basement, having collected baskets of laundry from each of the guys' rooms upstairs. In his efforts to carry the surprisingly heavy loads down the stairs, he had realized he had to give up the additional burden of carrying his own boxers. Somewhere upstairs he had left his boxers on the floor. Now, standing naked in front of the washing machines, he felt absolutely vulnerable, too vulnerable to face his huge housemates naked. To think that just days before, clothes had been no big issue to him. Man, how he loved parading around half or entirely nude to show off his superiority to his housemates.

Sam looked at the baskets in front of him, and wondered if any of his housemates' clothes would fit. He bypassed Brian's pile, realizing that the 6' quarterback's wardrobe was likely to be too big on him. He instead looked through Greg's pile first.

Finding a relatively clean T-shirt, he slipped it on over his head. The shirt fell loosely over his body and way past his waist. "Fuck!" he uttered to himself, as he realized just how much he was swimming in "puny" Greg's clothes.

He quickly ripped off the shirt, and reluctantly turned to Zeke's pile. He had remembered shopping for gym clothes with Zeke in the past, and how he used to chuckle at all the little clothes Zeke had to purchase. Now, it was he rummaging through the Smalls and Extra Smalls.

He found a pair of shorts first, and slipped them on. As he realized he had to tug a little to get the shorts over his massive quads, he smiled with a strange sense relief. Yeah, these were going to do just fine. As he buttoned the shorts, he looked down. The shorts were a just a tad loose around the waist, and were longer on his leg than what he had remembered how they appeared on Zeke. But, how snugly they fit around Sam's legs, outlining the powerful muscles underneath.

Sam had always wondered how he and Zeke fared in terms of their proportions. If both men were ever to be the same height, who'd be the more muscular? He returned to Zeke's pile, and found one of Zeke's tanktops. He grabbed it, slipped it over his head, and soon had the answer to his question. He had struggle a little, stretching the fabric just to fit it over his immense chest. He even needed to breathe in deeply, so that he could roll the rest down over his abs. On Zeke, he remembered that the tanktop still hung loosely. But on Sam, though he was now two inches shorter, it was an remarkably tight fit.

In that moment, realizing that he truly was the most muscular of his housemates, he regained his old sense of power and hugeness. But that moment was brief, as he heard footsteps on the stairs.
11131122222.title: Laundry duty

choices: Zeke can't contain his feelings for Sam any longer.
"Huge" Sam shrinks some more.
111311222221.content:
“Hey Sam, you down here?” Sam spun around. It was Zeke!

Zeke continued his way down the stairs. “I just thought I’d check in, and … um …”

“What?” Sam retorted. “Go on, finish what you were going to say!”

“Sam, I just wanted to see how you were doing.”

“Oh, please. I’m sure you came down here to look at the carnie freak? Hunh, you were probably hoping to see if I shrank some more, right?”

Zeke was quiet. He really had been worried about Sam, and had come down to check on him. At the same time, though, there was a feeling inside him he couldn’t deny – how turned on he felt knowing that the big Sam he always admired and who always seemed emotionally distant to him was now smaller than him and perhaps more approachable.

“Well,” Sam continued, “I’m the same size as when you last saw me. So, you can leave me alone now. I got work to do, remember?”

Sam turned back to the piles of laundry. He had originally considered starting with Zeke’s clothes, since they seemed to be a good fit on him too. But, with Zeke down here now, no doubt keeping an eye on him, he decided to start with Greg’s clothes instead. He grabbed an armful of shirts, and walked over to the top-loading washing machine. He was surprised how high the top was, though it was still quite manageable to toss the clothes into the machine. He returned to the pile and grabbed another arm load.

All this time, Zeke stood watching, somewhat dazed and speechless. Eventually he snapped to, and headed over to Sam, “Hey bud, how can I help?”

Sam grunted, but he could tell that Zeke was being sincere. “Um, sure. Why don’t you start sorting some of Brian’s clothes while I finish with this?”

Zeke did as he was told, separating Brian’s whites from his darks. All the while, he looked over at Sam, who was busy putting the last load of wash into the machine. Sam looked up at the shelf above the machines, where the detergent bottle was kept. Damn, that’s pretty high… Sam stretched as much as he could, but couldn’t reach the bottle.

Feeling frustrated, he turned and grunted to Zeke, “Um... some help here, please!”

Zeke stopped what was he doing and immediately joined Sam by the machine. “Everything okay?”

“Can you … um … get the detergent for me?” Sam flushed with embarrassment. “I can’t … er … reach … it.”

Zeke looked at the detergent container, and began to snicker.

“What’s so funny, asshole? Jeez, I thought you were here to help me…”

“Hey, calm down, bud,” Zeke said, trying to suppress laughter. “I’m just laughing because I’m not used to being the only one not able to reach things on the upper shelves. Here, check this out.” Zeke stretched his arms up, and sure enough, he just barely missed the shelf. Zeke then walked to the side of the machine, and grabbed a stepstool. “Whenever it’s my time for laundry, I need to use this.” Zeke stepped onto the stool, grabbed the detergent, and handed it to Sam.

“Thanks,” Sam said, then hastily added, “and I’m sorry.”

Zeke smiled, as he stepped off the stool. “Hey, no problem. I’m just glad I have a partner now to battle those big jerks upstairs.”

“Yeah, they’re such assholes,” Sam agreed, suddenly feeling somewhat more relaxed having Zeke around.

Zeke could also feel the tension between each other begin to fade. “Hey boss, I’ve been meaning to ask you. Are those my clothes you’re wearing?”

“Um, yeah. Hope you don’t mind.”

“Not at all.” He stood there for a moment staring at Sam. Zeke always thought he was a mighty huge guy at his size, but Sam looked enormous, stretching his clothes out to their limits.

“What you looking at now?” Sam asked.

“Nothing. Just … my clothes fit you so much better than they do me.”

“Yeah,” Sam said smugly. “I may be a foot and half shorter, but I’m still pretty huge, hunh?” He puffed out his chest a bit, exaggerating even more the tight fit of Zeke’s tanktop.

Zeke was a bit speechless. He had always been a little turned on seeing Sam flex and strut. But seeing the more compact Sam now, still so cocky despite his reduced size, caused Zeke to suddenly feel overwhelmed by desire.

None of this was lost on Sam, who had noticed Zeke lust after him during their workouts. “Someone’s quiet all of sudden,” Sam mocked. He gestured to Zeke’s shorts, which couldn’t hide the hard-on underneath. “What? Little fag turned on by my hugeness?”
111311222221.title: Sam and Zeke in the Laundry Room

Zeke stared at Sam, marveling at his muscularity. For years he had lusted over that impeccable body. He had had dreams of feeling the power of those incredible arms and the force contained in that powerful chest. Zeke knew that Sam had been with other men, mostly scrawnier guys who worshipped Sam’s mighty body. But Zeke had always been afraid of making a move himself.

What was stopping him? Before, when Sam towered over him by over a foot, he had seemed like an unapproachable god. But here he was, reduced down to mere mortal size, with all those majestic proportions intact. As Sam continued to preen about, flexing while jabbering on about his “hugeness,” Zeke’s felt he could no longer control himself as a new confidence began to stir within. Now, with his height advantage, he had his chance. He swelled up his own chest, and began to advance toward Sam.

Sam watched as his now-taller workout buddy approached him. There was an undeniable look of hunger or perhaps rage in Zeke’s eyes. Sam wondered if he had gone too far in teasing Zeke. He stepped back, but found himself up against the washing machine. Feeling trapped, Sam worried about Zeke’s intentions.

“There’s something, I’ve been meaning to do for a long time,” Zeke said, reaching forward and grabbing Sam’s pecs. Sam was taken aback by the strength of Zeke’s hands, and was unsure of his own next steps.
1113112222211.title: Zeke Makes His Move

choices: Zeke’s still pretty pissed off.

1113112222212.content:
Zeke was turned on by Sam. Yet at the same time, the return of Sam’s cocky attitude was reminding Zeke what a jerk Sam could be.

He looked over at Sam, preening and jabbering on about his hugeness. “Hugeness”? Jeez, the guy’s not even five feet tall! Zeke had been sorry for the poor guy, but Sam’s oversized ego had returned in full force, and it was just too much. Zeke had long tired of being picked on for his short height, especially by Sam, the man he idolized. And he was suddenly flooded with memories of all the times Sam referred to him with such names as Shorty, Pipsqueak, and Shrimp. But that wasn’t and shouldn’t be the case anymore after Sam’s shrinking today. Perhaps it was time to remind Sam of his new pecking order in the house.

Zeke folded his arms across his chest, and stepped toward Sam.

Sam watched his now-taller workout buddy approaching him. There was an undeniable look of anger in Zeke’s eyes. Sam wondered if he had gone too far in teasing Zeke. Should he apologize? He stepped back, but found himself up against the washing machine. Feeling trapped, Sam worried about Zeke’s intentions.

Zeke continued advancing until there was barely an inch between them. The close proximity between them emphasized their height difference.

“Hey!” Zeke barked while looking down at Sam. “Who you calling a little fag?”

Sam had never seen Zeke angry before. And from his current height and viewpoint, seeing Zeke so angry sent chills down his spine. Sam may have been the stronger of the two, but Zeke was no slouch and would put up a good fight. And right now, all of Zeke’s muscles seemed all tensed up, ready for a good thrashing.

The thought of little Zeke being such a potential threat freaked Sam out. He felt nervous, and vulnerable, and downright small. He hated looking up into Zeke’s eyes, and he cowered back against the washing machine. The size of Zeke continued to overpower him, as if he were getting even bigger, wider, taller with each second. TALLER?

Sam’s mind raced to earlier in the day. After his last shrinking spell, he had been eye-to-nose with Zeke, but now he was staring right at Zeke’s mouth, and then watched as Zeke’s mouth rose up higher. He could feel Zeke’s tight clothes begin to slack, and the top of the washing machine rise up his back.

“I’m waiting for answer!” Zeke’s voice seemed to boom. “Who are you to call me little?”

Realizing he had better say something to Zeke, Sam looked back up. He had to bend his neck even more now to look into Zeke’s eyes. “Zeke, I’m sorry! I’m sorry!” was all he could squeak out.

How does Zeke respond?
1113112222212.title: Don't Mess with Zeke

Sam looked up into Zeke's eyes. All he could do was mutter, "Zeke, I'm sorry! I'm sorry!"

"Sorry?! Sorry?!" Zeke repeated, feeling long-suppressed feelings of anger well up inside him. "Do you know how just how much crap I've had to put up with your sorry ass the past couple years?"

Sam stood back in shock realizing that something dark had triggered inside his old lifting buddy. Where was all this pent-up anger coming from? Zeke had always been a sweet guy. He never dared raise his voice to him. He had always worshipped the ground he walked on … happily, at least Sam thought.

Zeke continued, "All those times in the gym you'd humiliate me, joking in front of everyone about how light the weights I lifted were. And all those the times with the guys, in which you'd tease and get everyone to laugh at me. Making everyone call me Shorty. Jeez, you even had all the women at school treating me as if I were a little boy…. And all along, I just stood around and taken it. Well, no more!"

Sam was feeling the washing machine behind him continue to rise. He realized he had already shrunk another inch, maybe two. Sensing Zeke's anger continue to rise, he knew he was going to have to make a break for it, get away, until Zeke had time to calm down.

At that moment, the washing machine buzzed, and Zeke's eyes diverted to it. Sam knew this was his chance, and quick darted to Zeke's right.

But Sam was not fast enough, as he felt Zeke's arm grab him round the waist, and with surprising force push him back against the machine.

"Where do you think you're going? We're not done here!" Zeke growled.

Sam was surprised by Zeke's gruff turn, yet the act of being pushed back against the machine triggered his own feelings of anger. He forgot about his shrinking. Nobody pushed Sam around. Nobody.

Sam's breathing intensified, and the muscles throughout his body tensed, preparing for fight. He raised both his arms up, and shoved Zeke back, sneering, "Don't you dare fucking push me."

Sam may now be the shorter of the guys, but he was still quite the powerhouse, and Zeke felt the full impact of Sam's blow, teetering back a few steps and nearly falling on his ass.

Sam smiled, realizing he still had some force to him. Unafraid, now that his first move had had such an impact, and forgetting their height differences, he lunged toward Zeke, desiring nothing more than to take down this Pipsqueak.

Zeke was still recovering from Sam's shove, when he saw Sam rushing straight toward him, then… BAM! Sam was on top of him, as the two men tumbled to the floor.

Sam was no stranger to the wrestling mats, and his arms remembered moves from years ago. He grappled around Zeke now, quickly taking the offensive, and seeking to pin him down. He needed to prove once and for all to Zeke that he was still boss around here.

Zeke struggled against Sam's might, doing what he could to deflect Sam's moves. It was a tough struggle, but he found he was able to hold his own, at least for the moment. And so, the two men continued to tumbled about, Sam the constant aggressor, Zeke in defense.

A few moves later, and Sam had wrapped his legs around Zeke's torso. Zeke felt his air supply restricted at the pressure building against his chest. Gathering all his strength, he stretched both his arms, unlocking Sam's hold, and causing Sam to fall backward.

Zeke then leapt onto Sam's body, ready now to take on the offense. But Sam was ready for him, deflecting Zeke's, holding off all attacks, while also recuperating from the recent blow.

Sam kept on holding off Zeke, but he could feel the force of Zeke's moves increasing. Zeke seemed stronger now, and in more control. Likewise, Zeke noticed Sam was getting easier to manipulate and move. Zeke could feel his confidence build, and continued to build on his attacks.

Sam burned inside, grouping what anger was left inside him, to motivate his strength to release himself from Zeke's grasp. Sam was able to briefly slip from Zeke's hold, but moments later Zeke was back on top of him, stronger than before. Zeke's impossibly long arms now wrapped around Sam, flipping him face down, and then … whoosh … Sam felt the pressure of Zeke flopping down on Sam's back.

Sam tried relentlessly to escape from Zeke as got in position of his final hold, Sam's exertions were to no avail. Zeke's hold was too strong for him.

Zeke began to cackle, enjoying his victory over his onetime torturer. How good it felt to defeat the mighty Sam! To have biggest guy he had ever known now helpless beneath him!

"FUUUUCCKKK!!!" he yelled triumphantly, "That felt awesome!" He could feel Sam wriggle helplessly beneath him. Zeke smiled, then ...

1113112222212211111.content:
Sam did his best not to think of how small he was becoming.

But, unbidden, thoughts tumbled around in his mind. "I look like a shrimp," he though forlornly. "I am no bigger than a 10-year-old boy!"

In fact, he was being somewhat optimistic, which was brought home to him when he and his three buddies got into line at the cashier's station with the clothes Brian, Zeke and Greg had selected for him.


A woman and a boy were ahead of them as the cashier scanned their items.

"Isn't this a great place to buy clothes for children," the woman said as she turned and spoke to Brian.

"Umm, yes, it is," he agreed.

She held her son by his wrist. "Are you shopping for your little brother?"

Brian laughed at her question, but before he could answer, Sam could not help but blurt out his own indignant response. "I'm not a kid, lady!"

The woman gasped as she took her first good look at Sam, who despite his vertically-challenged physique, was sporting a five o'clock shadow on his well-chiseled features.

"I'm so sorry, sir," she mumbled. "I assumed..."

"Mommy, that man is littler than me!" Her son commented, intrigued to find himself with an advantage over an adult.

Thankfully for everyone involved, the cashier completed scanning the woman's items, and she paid quickly and fled in silence with her son, who kept looking back over his shoulder at Sam.

Brian put his beer down on the cashier's station, while the other guys unloaded Sam's new clothes.

"Aren't these adorable?" The cashier commented as she rang up the denim overalls.

Sam groaned, but Brian and Greg snickered.

Zeke, who noticed how the clothes Sam had borrowed from him were rapidly becoming too large for a good fit on their diminished roommate, poked Brian in the ribs.

"Just pay already," Zeke said. "I think we better get Sam home."

After completing the transaction, Sam was obliged to follow his roommates, all now towering above him, to the parking lot and the waiting car.

Brian, who had arrived on his own, got into his vehicle. "See you guys back at home."

On the ride home, Sam rode in miserable silence. He still brooded over the woman's assumption that, being so short, he must be a kid. Even worse, he kept flashing back to her brat's rude staring.

"Can this get any worse?" Sam thought.

He had his answer a few minutes after arriving at home. Zeke and Greg both insisted he change into his new clothes immediately, so he took the shopping bags and retired to the bathroom.

A few minutes later, he stood in front of the full-length mirror on the back of the bathroom door and stared at himself. He felt humiliation deep in the pit of his stomach as he stared at his muscular body squeezed into these hideous and garish clothes for a grade-school boy.

He sighed, and had to acknowledge that at least the clothes fit well.

For now.

Suddenly, the door opened. Greg stared down at him. "Oh, man," he said, failing to control his laughter. "Wait until Zeke and Brian see you."

"Fuck you!" Sam said, and slammed the door closed in Greg's face.

He turned away from the mirror, refusing to be reminded of how far he had fallen so quickly.

"It has to end," he pleased. "Surely this is the end."
1113112222212211111.title: Clothes make the... man?

Sam remained in the bathroom for a good 15 minutes more, afraid to face his roommates. He could hear them already cackling outside in the living room. No doubt, they were laughing about him, he thought.

Finally, he summoned the courage to head out. “Shhh, guys. I think I just heard the bathroom door,” he could overhear Greg say.

As Sam walked down the hallway, he thought about turning and running back. But instead, he braced himself and kept his cool, and continued toward the living room.

The three roommates were sat there quietly, anticipating his entrance. Then, as Sam walked confidently as he could into the room, the guys all burst into laughter. All it had taken was one look at their macho, former-giant stud roommate, now wearing a pair of kid’s overalls and a cartooned T-shirt.

“What’d I say?” Greg laughed, “Isn’t he adorable?”

“Adorable?” Brian added, “He looks ridiculous. Like some over-steroided child!”

“Guys!” Sam yelled back at them. “I’m in the room here!”

“Sam, we’re sorry…” Zeke replied.

“No, we’re not!” Greg interrupted.

“Greg, chill!” Zeke continued, though he was having a hard time refraining his own laughter, “Sam, we are truly sorry and feel bad that all this is happening. But, c’mon! How many times have you laughed at us when we were down? And, man, have you looked at yourself? You’re looking pretty silly.”

Sam couldn’t find the humor of the situation and just glared back at Zeke.

“Hey, Sam. Over here!” Brian said quickly.

Sam turned; then, click. Brian captured a pic of Sam with his camera phone. Sam really began to steam, as Brian looked at the phone, and smiled. “This one’s a keeper!”

Sam lunged toward Brian, but before he got anywhere near him, Brian threatened, “One step closer, dude, and this photo’s totally going on Facebook!”

“Yeah, yeah, yeah!” Greg egged Brian on.

“No!!!!” Sam screamed, stopping dead in his tracks.

Brian looked down at Sam, pityingly, “Ok, dude. No, I won’t do that.” Then he quickly added, “But I’m still gonna keep this picture.” Brian tucked the phone back into his pocket, smiling contentedly to himself.

“Fine, keep it!” Sam glared back, feeling somewhat defeated.

“Hey, Sammy. Come join us on the couch! You’ve had a rough day. You need to relax a bit!” Greg said.

Reluctantly, Sam headed over to where Greg and Zeke sat. He looked at the giant couch, realizing he couldn’t just hop on. Instead, he used his arms and climbed up onto it, in between both Zeke and Greg.

As he leaned back, his legs rose up from the floor, and dangled there. He then looked at the guys next to him. Even while sitting, Greg and towered above him. He felt like such a child.

He knew he had to take his mind off of these thoughts. He noticed then that the TV had been on and was now on mute and showing some ads. “What are we watching?” he asked Greg.

“Oh, just some college football.”

Sam suddenly looked up at Greg, a bit alarmed. “Hey Greg, why aren’t you playing today?”

“I don’t want to talk about it,” Greg mumbled. “That coach…” Greg sat quietly for a moment, grumbling to himself, then suddenly got up from the couch. “I’m gonna get me some beer. Sammy, you want some?”

Sam, noticing that Greg’s vindictive side was beginning to chill, smiled and accepted Greg’s offer.

Greg headed into the kitchen and soon came back with beers for all the guys. He handed Sam the bottle first. Sam couldn’t help but marvel at how huge the bottle was. “Man, this is the biggest beer I’ve ever seen!” Then, for the first time since his shrinking began, he laughed. “Ha, guess there’s some good to come out of all this shit!”

Greg cracked a smile and patted Sam on the head, before heading over to Brian and giving him his beer. He then walked toward Zeke, who motioned he wasn’t interested in drinking.

“I think I’m gonna head downstairs instead, and do some liftin’,” Zeke said. He got up from the couch, then started toward the stairs. “Hey Sam, wanna join me?”

“No.”

“Well, I guess we’re both seeing it live right here, hunh?” Greg said, as an oblivious Sam walk back into the room with a new beer in hand.

Brian looked over at Sam, and laughed. “Guess so!”

Brian put the remote down, intrigued by how the fictional film would compare to Sam’s real life. Sam meanwhile climbed back onto the couch, and looked up at the television set, “What’re you guys yakkin’ on about?”

Greg looked down at Sam, “See that guy, Sammy! He’s just like you. He’s also shrinking.”

Sam watched the man Greg referred to in a scene talking to a doctor. He sipped his beer in fascination as the doctor told the man what might be the cause of his shrinking.

“Hey Sammy, maybe that’s what’s happening to you! You been near any toxic chemicals lately?”

Sam shook his head no, and continued to watch, occasionally sipping more beer. A few scenes later, the man’s wife and his brother were in a conversation. Then suddenly, they spoke to the man, who was revealed to be child-size and sitting in a large armchair.

“Hey Sammy, that’s just like you!” Brian taunted.

Sam continued to watch. It was just like him. That guy looked so small, meaning that must be what he looked like…

He took another swig of beer, marveling again at the bottle’s size and heft. He hadn’t realized that the tight child-size shirt he had been wearing was now a little loose on him.

Sam had a hard time watching the scenes that followed. Though soon the man had found a way to stop shrinking, he looked so small and vulnerable around his large furniture and his large wife.

Sam stopped watching the movie and instead looked at his beer bottle. He realized how funny it looked at his size. So huge, so tall, so thick. He needed to hold it with both his hands. But, there was something awesome about it, too. He thought to himself that after he gets back to normal size, he would start his own brewery, making super-oversized bottles like these.

He smiled, and almost thought he saw the beer bottle get even bigger.

Some more scenes in the movie passed, and the man had now begun having an affair with a sideshow midget. Then suddenly, the man realized he was shorter than the midget. He was shrinking again. Sam sat up a bit, alarmed, not noticing the straps to his overalls tumble over his shoulders.

Brian quickly turned off the television set. “Dude, what’s your prob…”

Brian stopped in shock. Greg quick looked over at Sam, and his jaw dropped.

“What?” Sam asked, feeling nervous.

Greg then smiled weakly, and said, “I dunno how to tell you this, but you’ve shrunk some more!”
