What the hell was that all about? Sam wondered. And what were they planning upstairs? He began to worry about what would happen to him the next time he climbed up. There was no telling what kinds of torture his housemates had planned for him next. He better get back to laundry...

As he returned to the piles, Sam had nearly forgot about his most recent shrinking episode. That is, until he quickly realized how much looser Zeke's clothes were on him now. And how much bigger, taller, higher everything was around him … the washing machine and dryer, the laundry baskets, and the shelves … man, would he even be able to reach those shelves now, even with the help of the step stool?

Thankfully, though, the shrinking seemed to have stopped. He looked around him, and tried to gauge his new height. He had loss at least a few inches. He dreaded to think that he might be just 4 and a half feet tall, maybe less.

The washing machine buzzed the end of the cycle, and Sam walked over to it. Sam could continued to see the changes in height, as he struggled a little to raise the lid of the top-loading machine all the way up. Even worse, after he started to unload the wash, he realized it would be quite tricky for him to reach the clothes on the bottom of the machine. With a tinge of sadness, he grabbed the step stool and used it to prop him enough to reach the final clothes. As he leaned in, though, he could feel Zeke's loose shorts travel down his leg.... He was going to have to do something about these clothes.

As he started the dry cycle for Greg's clothes, he had an idea. He could do his best to shrink some of Zeke's clothes. So, he grabbed a couple of Zeke's T-shirts and a couple pairs of shorts, tossed them in the washer, and started a hot water cycle.


* * *


About an hour and half later, Sam reviewed the results. They had been somewhat disappointing.Most of the shirts had barely changed. Though one tanktop at least fit a little snugly on him. Though not quite as tight a fit as Zeke's clothes had been before, it would have to do.

As for shorts, he had experienced less success. They remained loose, and draped his legs. But, he was able to find a rope in the basement that he could use as a makeshift belt. And the length, though not ideal, was okay. Though Zeke's short shorts looked more like board shorts on him.

Sam loaded the final wash containing Brian's and the remains of Zeke's clothes into the dryer, and as the cycle began, he began to think about his next moves. It had been awfully quiet upstairs. What were they planning up there? He shuddered to think what would happen to him after he brought up the wash.

“Your shirt? What’s the deal? After a pump like that, I’m sure you also got quite the chest to show off. So what’s the deal today with the extra-huge shirt.”

Sam looked down, confused. That’s funny, this looked like one of his favorite workout shirts, only it was real loose on him. “Damn, which one of you fuckers has been doing my laundry this week? What’s the deal, stretching my shirts out?”

“Hey, hey, buddy. Don’t get upset. I’m sure it was just the laundry machine or something.”

“Yeah, or something….”

“Hey, forget about it, and let’s continue with the workout.”

As the guys left the station, Carl Brown snickered from around the corner.

For the remains of their workout, Sam felt real pumped, building and building on each rep despite the fact that he was lifting relatively light weights today. He couldn’t explain it, but he felt stronger and bigger than ever.

In the locker room afterword, he spent extra long in the shower. Soaping up, he could swear his muscles looked bigger, rounder.

“You almost done in there?” Zeke hollered. “Remember, it’s a shower, not a pool.”

“Hey, hey, hold your horses!” Sam said, stepping out the shower while wrapping a towel around himself.

Zeke was nearly floored staring at Sam. “Dude, look at you! Fuck, you look huger than ever!”

“Heh heh, you finally noticed? What was I telling you? I swear, I was really growing out there!”

Sam walked over to his locker, and started grabbing his street clothes. As he slipped his underpants on, he couldn’t help they seemed slightly loose. “Fuck, more clothes ruined in the wash…” he muttered to himself.

He then put on his shorts, which also felt oddly large. He made sure to put his belt on extra tight.

“Everything okay?” Zeke asked, as Sam started to slip on his sweatshirt.

“Of course, of course,” Sam said sliding the sweatshirt down over his extreme torso. But the hem dropped much further than his waist. And, as Sam slipped his arms into the sleeves, the sleeves fell past his sleeves.

“What the fuck?!” Sam yelled.

“Sam, you okay?”

“Which one of you fuckers is doing this? This is may seem like fun and games, but I can’t handle this shit!”

“Sam, what’s…”

“Nothing… just play innocent… Fuck…” Sam then proceeded to put on his sneakers, only the shoes were a couple sizes too big.

“Ok, fuckhead, laundry doesn’t fuck up shoes!”

“Sam, what are you talking about?”

“Your practical joke. The big shorts! The big shirt! The big shoes… Fuck, even you look big…” Sam said, standing up now and noticing Zeke looked taller than usual.

Zeke also noticed something was up. Hard to say but Sam looked shorter.

What does Zeke do?

13.content:
Brian and Zeke were jealous of Sam. They had been ever since they met him. Brian was jealous of how big Sam was and how big he had become. Zeke was jealous of Sam's height. Sure he was built too, but no one took him seriously because of his height.

Today was their chance to get back at Sam. Zeke WAS out picking up supplements, but he was getting different ones than the ones they usually take. These were supplements meant to take Sam down a peg or two. They all had to take them in order for it to work properly. They'd drain height and muscle from Sam, and it would go to Zeke, and Brian. How it worked exactly, Zeke wasn't sure.

Meanwhile Brian was cooking a meal to hide some of those supplements in Sam's food, just in case. They wanted to be sure he got enough to teach him a lesson! This was the last time they would be bossed around by Sam.

Zeke came back with the supplements. He bought powdered so it would be easier to hide in Sam's food. Once Brian was finished cooking, Zeke added the powder to the food for Sam. Just as they finished adding the powder to the food, Greg walked in.

"Hey fella's, " he said as he sat down at the table. "Supper smells good!"

"Dude, go wake Sam up," Brian spoke. "Tell him supper is finally ready."

They both knew they could count on Greg to wake up Sam. They never wanted to do it themselves, as it frightened them. It was like waking a dragon up after a hundred years sleep.

Greg loved to go into Sam's room. He was head over heels for the guy, even though he was treated like dirt. It was those bulging muscles that did him in. As Greg walked in Sam's room, he noticed the clothing and underwear strewn about the room. He went over to Sam, laying down on his bed and woke him up.

"Hey Sam, Sam!" Greg raised his voice a little. "Brian said to wake you up cause your supper is ready!"

Greg gave Sam a little shove. Just a light one.

"Oh..." Sam mumbled. "Ok, I'll be there right away. It's about time!"

Sam woke up and made his way to the kitchen. Brian and Zeke were already eating.

"Your plate is already made up Sam," Zeke said.

"Don't worry," Brian added. "We didn't forget!"

"This better be good for taking so damn long!" Sam spoke loudly.

Sam and Greg sat down and started eating their supper.

"This tastes a little funny..." Sam said. "Here Greg, try some of mine."

Sam spoke as he shoved a forkful into Greg's mouth.

"Tastes fine to me!" Greg exclaimed.

Sam continued to eat, as he knew Greg wouldn't lie to him.

What happens after supper?

131.content:
Sam felt a little woozy suddenly. He dismissed the feeling and goes to lay down in the living room. Sam turns on the TV and is watching some wrestling. The rest of the guys went about the house, doing their own things for a while.

Greg hadn't quite finished laundry, so he was downstairs folding clothes from the dryer. Brian was sitting in the living room on the recliner half watching wrestling with Sam. Zeke was in the kitchen finishing dishes.

Sam felt extra tired after dinner, and laying down on the couch made him quite sleepy. The room was spinning as he became even more sleepy. He closed his eyes to make the dizziness stop, and in no time at all was fast asleep. He tossed and turned during his sleep. Maybe it was because he was sleeping on the couch. But it never happened to him before on the couch.

Brian looked over at Sam and noticed him sleeping. He saw Sam toss and turn while he slept. He appeared to be sweating quite a lot. Brian noticed that Sam's clothes appeared looser on his frame now. Man this stuff worked fast! He thought. Brian noticed his own clothes felt tighter on his body now.

Zeke came into the living room to sit down now that dishes were done. He noticed Sam sleeping away, and Brian smiling at him.

"It's working already," Brian spoke quietly. "Look!"

Looking at Sam, Zeke noticed what Brian had noticed as well. Zeke looked down and noticed his jeans looked a bit too short for him now.

Sam started to wake up. Brian and Zeke pretended they weren't looking at him. They turned their heads to the TV instead.

"Man, am I tired!" Sam said, yawning. "I think I better hit the sack. This couch is no good for sleeping on..."

Sam gets up off the couch. Zeke and Brian notice that Sam doesn't look as big as before. They didn't notice it as much before while Sam was laying down. But when he sat up, they noticed he seemed to take up a bit less space on the couch. His head was about level with the back of the couch now. Normally he was a few inches higher than the back of the couch.

"You both look like you're gaining some muscle! Good for you!" Sam joked. "You'll never catch up to me though."

Zeke and Brian noticed that Sam's jeans seemed slightly longer on him than usual as he walked to his room to get some shuteye.

"Make sure breakfast is ready for me on time tomorrow morning!" Sam scoffed and slammed his bedroom door.

Zeke and Brian look at each other and smiled as Sam's door slammed. Soon Sam wouldn't be bossing them around any more. Zeke and Brian waited until Sam was for sure out for the night. They had to see Sam lose more. Do they wait until morning to see how much Sam has lost, do they try and watch more of his changes while he's sleeping, or do they see if the supplements are affecting Greg?

15.content:
While napping, Sam dreamt of being at the gym, not the school gym but rather in some industrial gym catered for seasoned lifters. There were huge guys all around him, powerlifters and pro bodybuilders … some Mr. Olympia competitors as well. Though few guys there were as tall as he, many were bulked out much huger.

Sam lay on the bench, preparing to do some presses. All these massive muscle dudes around him energized him. Plus he had taken some of those pills his new buddy Dr. Mark Rice in the college labs had given him to test. “If my calculations are right, these’ll really pump you huge,” Dr. Rice told him.

Fuck, he could feel that pump already! Like his arms were on fire! “Damn, these weights are too light!” he called out, causing a nearby trainer to rush over with more weights. While waiting for that trainer, his arms felt swole, his chest felt swole, his legs felt swole. All over, he could feel them muscles swelling. He was growing!

When the trainer came back to him, Sam took to the heavier weights like a madman. “More! Too light!” he barked. A couple other trainers started running over with even more weights, loading them on, as Sam continued to lift, and lift, and lift then with easy. By now, his arms had split his sleeves; and with each rep, his shirt lost extra seams, until just rags lay across his pecs.

More weights were added, and everyone in the gym had turned to watch Sam lift. When he finally finished and sat up, gasps were heard around the place at seeing his swollen gargantuan muscles. “Think this is something?” Sam said, lifting his arms up, flexing them, pumping them up huger. He stood up, and continued flexing, all his muscles now growing.

A crowd of fellow behemoths surrounded him, awing and drooling over his growing body. “Fuck, you all look so tiny to me now!” He watched as a couple previous Mr. Olympias began pawing at his muscle. Sam sneered down at them, flexing more, and laughed. “Who’s your muscle god now, eh? I’m the biggest fucker you guys ever gonna see!”

“Oh, yeah…,” a voice growled from the other side of the gym, interrupting Sam's posing.

The crowd of musclemen parted to the side at hearing the challenge, and Sam called out, “YEAH! Who the fuck do you think you are?”

He peered across the gym, where he saw a big guy, shirtless, curling weights. Though the dude was facing the opposite way, and though his back muscles looked expansive, he seemed no match for titan Sam.

“Well… aren’t you gonna answer me?” Sam called across. But the guy kept curling, his silent back to Sam.

With his mighty paws, Sam knocked his admirers to his side, and he stormed across the gym. His eyes were locked on his detractor, as he stepped closer and closer… and closer… and closer…. Damn, just how long was this gym! Surely, he should’ve reached the other side by now. His mysterious critic after all seemed closer… seemed…

Something wasn’t right, though. Suddenly, not knowing why, Sam wanted to stop, but his legs kept moving him forward against his will. He felt like panicking, as he realized getting close to his competitor, the dude was really beginning to look big. Not just muscular, but tall. Sam already was needing to bend his neck back to look up to the guy's head, and he still wasn’t near him.

The guy just loomed higher and higher, as Sam's legs kept moving him beyond his will. When Sam finally reached him, Sam’s head was not even as high as the dude’s waist. As if on cue, the dude swung around, laughing. Through his magnificent pecs high above Sam, the giant smiled and continued laughing. “Hello, Sam!...”

Sam gasped, it was his training buddy Zeke!

Sam read the directions for taking the pills that Dr. Rice had written out for him. He was only supposed to take one pill three times daily. Sam took just one pill now to make sure it worked. He figured that was just a guideline so he would take more later if they didn't work well enough.

Sam smirked; it was working! He couldn't believe it. It really was working. And he was starting to feel famished! He wasn't really hungry when he came into the room. Now suddenly he needed to eat. A lot!

Sam polished off three bowls, leaving not much left over.

"Wow," Greg commented. "I've never seen you eat that much dude. You sure you're okay?"

"Yeah! I feel great!" Sam let out a loud belch as he polished off his last bowl. "Thanks Bri!"

He wanted to check out his muscle growth in the mirror. He couldn't believe it! He was bigger already, his t-shirt straining on his frame now more than usual. He smirked and flexed in the mirror. Suddenly he noticed something happening...

Sam had just gotten to his doorway, when he suddenly felt a bit lightheaded. Must be more hungry than I thought…

For a few moments, the room seemed to spin. Then though the spinning stopped, he seemed in a slight haze. Something seemed to be changing. Sam looked down where his hand was on his doorknob. Funny, the doorknob seems to be getting higher. Then, his shorts again fell to the ground. What the fuck’s happening?

He looked around the room, seeing things seeming to get a little higher. Then he looked back at the mirror, and noticed that tight shirt looking looser. Then just as suddenly as it had started, the changes stopped.

Sam scrambled to his drawers and began rummaging, panicking that what he just saw hadn’t happened. He found what he had been looking for, a simple tape measure he usually used to check out his pumped arms. Now, he grabbed one end, and rested his head against a wall, dropping the rest of the measure to the ground. He used his foot to mark the measurement.

He dropped the tape and bent down to look. “No!” he barreled out loud. His foot had marked 6’2”. Sam had shrunk.

He clambered back to his feet, grabbing the jar of pills. What the hell had Dr. Rice given him? But just when he was about to leash out his fury, a different sensation came over him. His body began to feel warm all over, not feverish, but rather as if someone had wrapped their arms all around him. It felt good, comfortable, relaxing… His muscles felt at first relaxed, but then, despite no exertion, they began to feel charged, pumped.

Damn, feels like one of the best workouts I ever had… All his muscles felt gently alive now, and Sam found himself feeling almost half drunk, flexing his muscles, admiring the peaks of his biceps, the girth of his quads. His chest felt amazing, and he quickly tore off the loosened T-shirt he had been wearing to get a good look at it. His pecs were fully swollen, engorged, and… getting bigger?

Fuck, he was growing! He had completely forgotten about his recent shrinking spell, instead he was too enraptured by his swelling body. Even after the growth seemed to subside, he was rapt in the afterglow of it, admiring his extra thickness, his extra width. Flexing his guns, he admired their higher peaks. He had to at least gained an inch in just those couple minutes.

His reverie was interrupted as there was a knock at his door. “Sam, buddy, you coming to dinner?” It was…

Brian stepped in. But once he saw Sam, he halted and stood stock-still, shocked at how enormous and swollen Sam looked. “Fuck, dude! What the hell? Look at you! You’ve blown up!”

“Don’t you come another step forward!”

Brian stopped immediately, alarmed at the tone in Sam’s voice. Sam looked at his buddy Brian, remembering how supportive Brian had been to him all these years, and realized he needed tell him the whole truth.

“Hey Bri, before you come any closer, I gotta tell you something kinda crazy.”

Brian just stared at Sam, confused. Something seemed off, but he couldn’t quite tell what.

“You’re never gonna believe this, bud. But I’ve, er… changed…”

“Fuck, I can see that. You got even more massive!”

“Well, there’s that. Your eyes aren’t deceiving ya, I am bigger… That’s for sure.” He flexed his guns for good measure. “Well, my muscles are bigger. But all of me… Well, I might as well get to the point. It seems this new muscle has a price… my height…”

Brian laughed, “What? That’s absurd, big guy!” Brian started again toward Sam, but as he got closer, he realized Sam didn’t seem quite as tall as usual. Sam remained silent, watching Brian get closer, looking taller than he remembered. He still had a couple inches on Brian, but just that.

“C’mon, Sam, you’re joking with me. You’re bending your knees, right?” Brian looked down, saw that Sam’s legs were perfectly straight. “Wait, you’re telling the truth! How? What? Why?”

“Dude, I have no idea. I mean, I have my guesses…” He looked over at the supplement jar from Dr. Rice and told Brian about this early testing he was doing for these pills.

“Testing?” Brian responded. “Sounds more like experimenting!”

“Fuck, I dunno, Dr. Rice surely would have said something about side effects. Besides, he was right about the growth,” Sam said, admiring once again his new bulk.

“Dude, get your head out of your muscles for once! We gotta do something, talk to someone on this! Maybe we should confront Dr. Rice?” Sam looked at him skeptically. “At very least we should tell the guys.”

The men headed downstairs, joining their roommates for dinner. When Greg saw Sam enter the dining room, he nearly dropped the plates he had been carrying. “Good god, are you turning into the Hulk?”

“Heh heh, sure feels like it!” Sam laughed, raising his arms up, giving them a good flex. Sam’s voice then got serious. “Boys, we gotta talk…”

As they sat around the table for dinner, Sam filled them in while wolfing down food, he felt so starved. He told them about Dr. Rice’s special pills and how he got involved in taking them. He talked about the growth he had experienced, and then about the shrinking. Greg and Zeke looked incredulous, so Sam got up and stood next to Brian to give them a visual.

“Damn, boss… 4 inches, that’s crazy,” Zeke said, realizing that if he were 4 inches less, he’d be under 5 feet.

“Yeah, though, it may sound crazy, but I kinda getting used to it. I still bigger than you shrimps. And, well, there are other benefits as well,” Sam said, beginning to bounce his pecs.

The boys stared at the show until Zeke blurted out, “Just how big are those babies?”

15121211211.content:
Sam turned to Greg and Zeke. “Get out!” he barked at them. Both men quickly spun around and fled the room, not needing to be told twice.

Brian meanwhile stiffened, in all senses of the word, left alone in the room with Sam. His roommate sauntered over to him, his bulk looking more massive with each step. Sam placed a hand under and up Brian’s sweatshirt to feel his meaty chest. “Why do you always hide yourself in such bulky clothes, bud?”

Sam brought his hands back out, and grabbed Brian’s shirt collar. Before Brian could say anything, Sam tore the sweatshirt in half, revealing Brian’s torso.

“That’s better…” Sam said, leaning in to graze Brian’s chest with his mouth.

Brian, relaxing now, began to hold onto Sam, wrapping his arms around him, feeling the expanse of his back, the thickness of his lats, the side of his mighty pecs. Sam stood back up, smiling at Brian, then leaning forward, locked his lips against Brian’s.

As Brian returned his arms around Sam’s back, Sam did the same, pulling Brian in closer to him. He pulled tightly, ensuring both men’s chests pushed against each other and taking pleasure at how much his engorged chest pushed aggressively against Brian’s meaty but much smaller pecs. The feeling of Brian’s chest itself was incredible, but knowing his own pec dominance sent a rush through him, motivating him to flex his pecs some, and push tighter against Brian.

Brian got more aggressively into their kiss; Sam could tell he was enjoying the sensation of such nearness to his massive pecs. Sam leaned in even more, pushing up hard against Brian’s chest. He imagined his pecs pumping up even huger, breathing in, huffing his chest out… and out… and out… Oh fuck, he was expanding again. His chest was feeling like a balloon as it was puffing up harder against Brian. Damn, he had to lean up a little now to reach Brian’s lips. But damn, it was worth it. All this fucking muscle… fuckin worth no longer being the tallest dude in the house!
15121211211.title: Alone with Brian

choices: Greg, who was ready for his personal training session
Zeke, reminding Sam of their bodybuilding competition that day
151212112112.content:
Brian opened his eyes, a little bleary and a little confused where he was. He scanned his surroundings, and realized he was in Sam’s room. The memory of last night flooded back to him, and he smiled seeing his torn sweatshirt on the floor. Last night wasn’t a dream…

What had gotten into him last night? Sure, he had crushed on his massive roommate for ages, but he had never before so much as hinted to Sam such feelings, he thought. And certainly, he never imagined acting on them. Then, suddenly, in that moment, when Sam began aggressively seducing him, Brian lost control. Giving in to Sam’s kisses, feeling those massive pecs rub up against his own chest…. Fuck, those massive pecs then began inflating against him…. Brian felt his cock re-stiffen at the memory.

But there was more. He remembered that Sam had shrunk some more and was now shorter than him. Was that what caused that boldness to arise in Brian like never before. Brian took the lead now from Sam, shoving him onto the bed, tearing off his clothes, jumping on top of him and on top of that magnificent chest…

Brian’s reverie was interrupted by a shuffling next to him in bed. He rolled over and saw just that magnificent chest, rising unbelievably high, as Sam lay on his back beside him, seemingly still asleep. He watched Sam’s log-like arm slowly rise up, flex and rub his pec. Then a smile crept across Sam’s face.

“I see you looking…” Sam whispered teasingly.

“Can you blame me? You’re a fuckin’ mountain!” Brian responded.

“I am, aren’t I?” Sam growled. Then, suddenly, he sat up, got on his knees and straddled himself across Brian’s waist. Brian stayed lying down, staring up at the extraordinary pecs above him. He could barely see Sam’s face, so much muscle was in the way.

“Like the view, sport?” Sam said from above, bouncing his pecs. “I know you love this chest, after seeing the way you fucked it last night, ha ha!”

Brian reached up, grabbing a handful of meat. He cupped Sam’s nipples, feeling the heft of each pec, Sam continue to bounce. Then Sam pulled off Brian’s arms, and leaned forward more and more until his chest came crashing down on Brian’s face. Brian could barely breath, surrounded by such muscle, as Sam began to rock his chest up and down. Brian could only unleash his tongue to lick the passing muscle.

The tongue bath was interrupted as Sam’s alarm clock started to buzz. “Sorry dude,” Sam said, leaning over to turn the alarm off. “But your big dude’s got to hit the gym.”

Brian recovered from his dreamstate, looked at the alarm, then jumped up. “Fuck, I’m running late for practice!”

“Haven’t I been practice enough for you?” Sam teased.

Brian laughed, “Yeah, but I don’t think Coach’d see it that way.”

“Ok…” Sam laughed, rolling over, allowing Brian to sit up and get up from the bed. Brian looked the room, wondering what happened to his underwear. He heard a loud thump as Sam’s feet landed on the floor, and then “Whoa!”

Brian turned around, expecting to see Sam’s face, but instead barely saw the top of Sam’s head. Sam looked up at Brian’s face, and gulped. “Guess I got smaller…” For a moment, he felt unsure of his emotions and a little freaked out. But then, he surprised Brian and himself, as he burst into laughter. “How fucking weird, eh?”

Brian was pretty freaked out himself, seeing Sam so short, but Sam’s strange laughter gave him some ease. “Um, yeah boss, fuckin’ weird,” he said, trying to join in on the laughter, though uneasily.

“Funniest part is, I don’t feel any smaller. Fuckin’ feel huge!” Sam said, while sauntering toward his mirror. “Oh, fuck me! No wonder I feel huge. Look at this chest. I’m enormous!”

He turned to Brian, and barked, “Measure me!” Brian jumped, feeling a bit nervous. He grabbed the tape measure, and instinctively wrapped it around Sam’s chest. “60.5 inches. Dude, that’s fuckin’ incredible!”

“I’d say. Heh, imagine what this would fuckin’ be if I were my old height.”

The rest of Sam’s stats were just as impressive. 24-inch arms, 32-inch thighs, 33-inch waist. Brian was about to put the tape away, when Sam scoffed at him. “Where you going with that, dude? Aren’t you forgetting something?”

Brian shrugged. Then Sam barked, “My height, silly! Fuck, just how tiny am I?”

Brian wasn’t sure he wanted to know, but he proceeded to measure Sam anyway. 65 inches….

“Wow, more than a foot shorter than my normal height!” Sam said. Brian thought he noted a strange sense of glee in Sam’s voice.

Both men were startled as there was a knock on the door. “Hey Sam, you coming?”

It was…

1512121121122.content:
Zeke knocked on the door again. “Hey buddy, c’mon, I don’t want us to be late for the competition…”

Sam winked at Brian, “Wait’ll they see me today. After I arrive, there’ll be no competition, except for second place!”

Brian nodded his head, before Sam motioned authoritatively to get out of the room now. Brian, still naked, hurried out. “Hey,” was all Brian mustered to Zeke, as he bashedly scurried down the hallway.

“Lucky bastard…” Zeke murmured.

“What was that?”

Zeke spun around. “Holy fuck, Sam! You got small!”

“Small???” Sam barked. “Are you fucking kidding me? You call these cannons small?” He flexed his guns, way out-measuring Zeke’s own impressive arms. “Yeah, I may be a shortie now, but I’m still much more massive than you bud, not to mention still taller too, runt.”

Zeke nearly creamed when Sam lifted up his guns. Sam noticed Zeke's reaction and grabbed Zeke’s hands, forcing them on his pecs. “You think those arms are incredible, feel this!”

Zeke, zombie-like, began rubbing Sam’s chest, losing track of time, until Sam snapped him out of his reverie. “Fuck boy, we got a competition, remember?”

Zeke snapped to, “Yes, boss…”

“Go on down and get the car started. I’ll grab some things and meet you down there.”

Zeke hurried out, as Sam scrambled to find clothes to wear. He's have to ask Zeke to stop on the way to the competition and pick up new posing trunks. For now, he'd have to go commando, though none of his own shorts would fit him. He looked down at the clothes Brian left behind. Though way too long on him, he was at least able to squeeze the stretchy fabric of Brian’s shorts to just fit over his massive legs.

Brian’s shirt would no way fit on his huge chest, so he grabbed an old workout tanktop of his own. Formerly, it had been incredibly roomy on him, but now he could just barely squeeze it over his pecs. But once past those huge hurdles, the rest of the tank draped down his still-tight abs, below his waist, and even below his crotch.

“Fuck, looks like I’m wearing a tanktop dress!” Sam laughed to himself. He grabbed some scissors, cutting the hem to waist level. “Mmmm… Not bad,” he said admiring himself in the mirror.

Zeke honked the horn, and Sam barked out the window. “I’m coming….” He turned to get his wallet, then saw the jar of pills on his bedside table. “Can’t forget these,” he said, pouring a few into his hands.

15121211211221.content:
Sam quickly ingested a pill. “No time like the present…” he said to himself. He then pocketed the other pills in his hand for potential use later. He headed out to meet with Zeke, who had been growing increasingly impatient waiting for Sam in the car.

Sam slipped into the passenger seat. In the past, he had to duck and squeeze his way just to fit through the door, but at his current height he was able to get in without any work.

Zeke was still in shock, seeing his lumbering, now even more massive but much shorter roommate join him. Zeke barely spoke a word the first few minutes of the drive, then tried to make small talk.

“Traffic’s heavy today…”

“Heavy…” Sam murmured in response. “Hmm, I wonder what weight class they’ll put me in today?”

“What?” Zeke asked.

“Weight class… I mean, I know I’m no super heavyweight at my current height… Though I’m a lot more thicker than those bastards will be… Am I even a heavyweight?”

“Oh Sam, that must feel odd, knowing you no longer a super heavyweight?”

“Nah, it’s cool. I’ll grow back soon, and when I do, fuck, they’ll have to create a new weight class for me… Mega heavyweight, I think…”

Sam liked that word… Mega… Fuck, the mere thought of the word made him feel so fucking powerful. Mmmm, he could feel his pecs growing against the seat belt. Who the fuck cares if he could also feel his head slipping a little lower on the seat?

Oblivious to his passenger’s changes, Zeke kept on driving, wondering why Sam got suddenly got quiet. “Everything all right?”

Sam was meanwhile rubbing his own growing pecs. “Fuck, everything’s amazing, dude. Fuckin’ amazing…”

They were getting close to the venue, when Sam remembered he still needed posers for the competition. “Dude, stop over at the gym for a sec. I need to get me some new trunks…”

Zeke pulled into the gym parking lot and the two guys hopped out of the car. As Sam walked around the car toward Zeke, Zeke whistled at how massive his gym bud was. But as Sam got closer, Zeke’s jaw dropped, seeing that both men were now equal height.

This was not lost on Sam either, and the confidence he’d had with all his gains wavered. It was one thing to lose a few inches. But now he was tied for shortest in their house, and he always saw Zeke as super short. Now he was super short too. As the two men awkwardly walked into the store next to the gym, they both couldn’t stop taking stolen glances at the other, the strangeness of the two being eye-to-eye.

Once in the store, Sam felt even more uncomfortable. Everyone was so fucking tall! And they all were looking at him.

“Here’s the posing trunks,” Zeke called.

Sam hurried over, grabbing a small pair, and ducking away from the crowds into a changing room. The trunks were tight, but Sam had a frightening thought… What if he shrunk more? He decided to stick with these, rather than risk shrinking out of them on stage.

He stepped out and walked to the mirror; once there saw an absolute god stared back at him. Christ, that was his reflection. He looked unreal. Like one of those Photoshopped photos of fantasy bodybuilders he’d seen online.

Zeke wandered into the changing area, wondering what was keeping Sam. He found him there, posing in front of the mirror, transfixed. “Damn, Sammy, you may be me-sized now, but you are massive.”

“Henh, I’m only you-sized in height. Flex those guns of yours and let’s compare.” Zeke did as requested, and it was no comparison. Sam’s guns dwarfed Zeke’s in a major way. Despite his own well-toned body, Zeke looked scrawny next to Sam’s bulk.

Sam then stood behind Zeke, and looked at them in the mirror. “Ha, look how much wider I am than you! You can see my shoulders and traps behind you.”

He huffed his chest, his full confidence restored and then some. “Flex those pecs!” he commanded Zeke. Zeke followed suit, and Sam laughed some more, “Damn, look how much further these muscle tits stick out than yours! I’m a frickin’ muscle monster!”

15123.content:
Sam rubbed his hands across his pecs, and smiled. Fuck, they felt swole! He stared down at them, and from his view, they looked even bigger, too.

He walked over to his mirror, and stared at his reflection. He looked massive. No doubt about it. Doc’s formula was a success. He flexed his arms, watching those peaks rise up higher than ever before. He breathed in, and pushed out his chest, watching those mountains of pecs explode with size.

He then heard Zeke call him from downstairs: “You coming to dinner, buddy?”

Fuck, he couldn’t wait to show off to his buds. He grabbed his shirt and was about to pull it on, when he stared at the label – “XXXL”. Triple-extra large? His head felt foggy, confused. When the hell did he wear XXXL?

“I wish I was that big…” he murmured to himself. He wondered which of his buds was pulling a joke on him. Who snuck in while he was napping to replace his shirt with a size larger? But then, laughing, he decided to go ahead and put the shirt on anyway. He was more than impressed… The shirt fit snugly over his enlarged chest, and his biceps pushed against the sleeves. Sure, the hem hung pretty low on him. But that was to be expected with a shirt size so large.

He stared again at his reflection, taking in his entire body, all 6’4” of it. Mysteriously, and unknown to him, erased from his mind was his old life at 6’6”. Perhaps somewhere in his mind’s recesses he remembered that time, but now…

“Sam, you coming?”

Sam smiled, and headed toward the door…

Sam was just about to head out the bedroom door, when he thought of the pills. He quickly stepped over to his dresser, grabbed the tub of pills, poured out a couple, and swallowed them.

He then left the room, and headed downstairs. On his way into the dining room, he ran into Zeke almost literally. “Sorry, pipsqueak, didn’t see you down there, ha ha!” He laughed, never tiring of that old joke.

“Oh, uh, it’s okay, buddy,” Zeke responded, feeling a little intimidated by the giant lug. Zeke then noticed the strain Sam’s chest was putting on his T-shirt. “Whoa, dude…”

“Heh heh, you noticed?” Sam said, bouncing his pecs a little.

“Noticed? Fuck, I know your bod like the back of my hand…”

“Do you, dude?”

Zeke blushed, then continued, “You ain’t never been this huge before, dude.”

“What’s that?” Brian asked, entering the room, carrying Sam’s plate, which contained a giant cut of steak on it. “Sam getting bigger?”

“You fucking bet I am!” Sam roared, lifting his arms up and flexing them.

Brian nearly dropped the plate seeing those big guns blow up in front of him. He put the plate down, and walked over to get a closer look at Sam. “Fuck, just look at them!”

“Don’t I know it,” Sam smiled, dropping his hands back down on both his roommates’ heads, and giving them a good rubbing.

“Dude…” Zeke whined.

“Yeah, dude…” Brian said, softly. But Brian was noticing something… something seemed off.

“Hey buddy,” Brian said, his voice a little confused. “What’s wrong with your shirt?”

“My shirt!” bellowed Sam. “Ha, just a ton of pressure against these sleeves, dude!” He flexed one arm a little, pushing the sleeve to the edge of its limits.

“No, not that… The hem… why’s it long?”

“Long?” Sam then stared at Brian. “Oh, you’re the one, eh? Thought this was funny?”

“Sam, what are you talking about?” Brian said, sounding a little nervous.

“Switching out my shirt with a XXXL! What, trying to make me look small?”

Zeke, who tended to do Sam’s laundry, was now confused. “But buddy, you’ve always worn XXXL…”

“What, are you in on this, too? I’ve worn XXL… well, until now… sure it’s a little long, but fills this chest up well.”

Zeke and Brian looked at each other, confused. Then they heard a rumbling sound, and they turned to realize it was Sam, or rather his stomach.

“Where’s Greg?” Sam bellowed. “I’m starving!”

“Greg’s at the gym, getting in a late workout,” Zeke said.

“Fuck, why didn’t you say so earlier?” Sam said, plopping himself down in a chair, and beginning to cut into his steak. “A growing boy’s gotta eat… And, I gotta eat so as I can grow some more.”

Zeke stared at Brian, and mouthed the word “More?” Brian just looked dumbstruck. Sam meanwhile plowed into his meal.

152.content:
"Sorry, Sam, I didn't catch that. Did you have something to tell me?" Zeke commented.

Sam didn't respond. He couldn't respond. What would he say? Zeke had a body that was everything Sam had dreamed of becoming, an imposing, dominating ideal. Every muscle, every inch of his frame held a gentle but firm definition that radiated a smooth strength from every swell, every curve, every side. He was sitting on a bench of his own, bending slightly as he did curls with one arm, but he still easily loomed over Sam. The position only seemed to compact his frame, making him look even more intimidating and powerful as his forearm tensed, his payload casually lifted, crested with a firmly bulging bicep, then slowly lowered back down.

But he wasn't just using a dumbbell. He wasn't even using a curling bar. Sam realized with a pang of dread that Zeke was curling, with one hand, a loaded barbell- one that looked a lot like the same weight Sam had been using moments before for his bench press. Zeke's curls were hardly giving him trouble, either; every rep he did caused him to do little more than exhale, barely a grunt, at almost no visible strain.

"Mmmm, getting so big..." He purred with contentment.

"Zeke... what happened?" Sam asked incredulously.

"What do you mean?" Zeke replied in an eerily calm, smooth voice. He spoke with with a relaxed and casual nature he typically didn't even use in everyday life- he could have been smoking a joint, or waking from a deep slumber.

"You're... big. Bigger than me. Bigger than everyone, anyone I've ever known."

"That's ridiculous," Zeke replied with a chuckling smile. "Brian and Greg are both bigger than I am."

Suddenly, Sam became aware of the panting, clanging noises on either side of Zeke, and saw he was flanked by Brian and Greg... though not as Sam had ever seen them. Each of them was a meter larger than Zeke, and somehow even more developed; whereas Zeke's enormous build had still kept his proportions fair and balanced, Brian and Greg were nothing short of well-toned monsters. Brian was doing his own bench presses on a super-sized gym pew, but his bar was easily twice as long as the Olympic standard, and considerably more thick. Greg, meanwhile, was doing leg lifts on a proportionately massive machine. Every time Greg's massive legs went up, the soles of his feet leveled with Sam's face; and every time it hit its rest at the bottom, a sharp CLANG! filled the air, with a tiny tremor running out alongside it.

"Hey, Zeke, can you pass me another plate? I'm done with my warm-ups," Greg rumbled with a final CLANG! as he dropped his calves and released pressure on his thighs. His legs were as thick as tree trunks, and as such were prominently hale.

"Sure thing, Greg," Zeke answered, unceremoniously dropping his curling weight with a massive CLUNK on the rubber floor. He turned around, grabbed hold of a plate the size of a dinner table, and pivoted his torso in the other direction to give it to Greg. Suddenly, the weight was passing -over- Sam's head. The iron disc was every bit as wide in diameter as Sam was tall, and completely overshadowed him as it passed.

Sam was reeling. Zeke was bigger than he was? Brian and Greg were bigger than him? He was supposed to be the Big Deal. That was his job. Heck, that *was* him. But now he was the shortest of his flat-mates, no contest. Sam could only look at Zeke's absent-minded face from on high, never feeling more vulnerable or weak in his life.

"This isn't right," Sam murmured softly in disbelief. "None of this is. It can't be..."

"Sure it can," Zeke continued as he sat down, picked up his bar with his other arm, and started curling again, oblivious to Sam's reaction. "You always said so. I'm a runt. A shrimp. The smallest in our house. As a matter of fact... I'm the smallest person in the gym."

No sooner had Zeke finished talking than the noise of the trio expanded to all around him, the clamor of weights and voices of their lifters now all around him. He was in the center of a gym full of lifters just as huge as his three friends. These were the group that had been admiring him just a few minutes ago. Now they bantered, talk, groaned, shouted encouragement, but none of them were looking at him. They didn't even seem to know he existed. Sam watched with awe as a bodybuilder that had to be twenty-foot tall flex in a full-length mirror, when suddenly a thigh enveloped his vision- a lithe, towering athlete and his mate had passed through, nearly body-checking Sam. They paid him no notice- they'd been completely absorbed in their conversation and lumbered away, laughing.

All of a sudden, Sam became aware of a constant, tumultuous rumble trembling through the floor from the direction of the gym entrance. He turned around just in time to see a mob of new behemoths enter the already-crowded gym, but as he stared up in frightened wonder at them-

SMACK. He hadn't been paying attention, and had been hit in the head with a gym duffel bag like a cloth torpedo. The force knocked him on the ground... then he was lost, being pushed to and fro by over-sized beefcakes in a stampeding forest of legs.

Amidst the throng, Sam heard Zeke's sonorous timbre resonate through the gym air around him.

"But if I'm the smallest.. then what does that make you, Sam?"
152.title: Sam keeps on dreaming

info.brief_description: M/m shrinking story about a large jock brought down to size.
info.description:
Samson “Sam” Jones is the ultimate BMOC--a 6’6”, massively muscular former football star-turned-bodybuilder. A 6th-year college senior, he makes up for his lack of smarts by bullying and dominating his fellow classmates, not to mention his housemates.

His primary domain: where else but the gym. When not working out, he’s usually at home (who needs classes?). Home is a house he shares with 3 frat brothers: Brian, Greg, and Zeke. All four men, including Sam, are gay. Like everywhere else on campus, Sam rules the house, and his housemates manage all chores, including feeding and cleaning up after Sam. All three perform such tasks, partially out of terror, but also out of lust for their at-home musclegod.

But Sam’s reign of bullying terror is about to end, as one day he begins to find himself inexplicably getting smaller…


Please note the following rules:

There are now four branches to this story: Slow Shrinking, (Almost) Anything Goes, (Almost) Anything Goes (version 2), and Sam's Not the Only One Shrinking.

In Slow Shrinking, Sam’s reduction is more measured. At no branch in the story should he lose more than 1/5 of his then height. Transformation should be limited to Sam, and only consists of shrinking; no transformations into animals, inanimate objects, or women. His age (24) should remain the same, as should his height-weight proportion (ie., no muscle loss).

In both versions of (Almost) Anything Goes, as the titles imply, just about anything can happen--to Sam, to his housemates, to visitors of the house, other gym rats--have fun!

For all story branches, the following additional restrictions apply: No underage sexual contact; that said, children can be added as minor side characters, and in the (Almost) Anything Goes stories, main adult characters can regress to childhood (though as children, they shall not engage in sexual contact). Also, this is a gay storyline; don’t turn the characters hetero. Finally, please keep all chapters at a substantial length--a minimum of 50 words per chapter is required (though more than that is appreciated). Any chapter less than 50 words will be deleted.

Enjoy!
